En su tiempo libre ella hace deporte y celebra las fiestas religiosas del pueblo. Estas fiestas se celebran los días 8 y 22 de diciembre y el día 22 de julio.
texts.en:
Johana Alexandra A. Y. is 22 years old.  She lives with her common-law husband and her one year-old daughter who is called Norelys Anahi Acosta A..  She lives in Chillanes, in Bolívar province.

Johana Alexandra is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new group is located in the community of Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.

Johana Alexandra set up a business selling clothes 9 months ago.  She buys her products in the city of Guayaquil.  She is requesting this loan so that she can increase her merchandise.  This loan will enable her to stock up with merchandise.

In the future, Johana Alexandra hopes to own her own home and her own premises from which she can run her business.  The biggest challenge she faces is when a customer doesn't make their repayments.  In her spare time, she likes to take part in sports and local religious fiestas.  The fiestas are celebrated on the 8th and 22nd of December and on the 22nd of July.

loans.use: To keep her business running

loans.name: Alonso Herminio

texts.es:
Alonso Herminio A. tiene 42 años, es casado y tiene 4 hijos (Miguel Angel, 25, Victor Alonso, 24, Johana Alexandra, 22 y Kruzkaya Kayetara, 14). El vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Alonso Herminio es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.   

Alonso Herminio trabaja en cerrajería. El compra y vende sus productos en Matilde Esther, Bucay y Milagro. El solicita el crédito para incrementar el taller. 

Su sueño es tener una cubierta metálica. El mayor desafío que se enfrenta en el negocio seria que los clientes retiren sus obras en el tiempo estimado. 

Sus hobbies son ve el futbol en la televisión y salir a ver el futbol y el indoor que se realiza en la comunidad.
texts.en:
Alonso Herminio A. is 42 years old.  He is married and has 4 children (25 year-old Miguel Angel, 24 year-old Victor Alonso, 22 year-old Johana Alexandra and 14 year-old Kruzkaya Kayetara).  He lives in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

Alonso Herminio is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new group is located in the community of Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.

Alonso Herminio works in a locksmith's shop.  He buys and sells his products in Matilde Esther, Bucay and Milagro.  He is requesting this loan to expand his workshop.  His dream is to have a metal roof.  The biggest challenge he faces in his business is customers not collecting the work he has done on time.  His hobbies are watching soccer on television and going out to watch outdoor and indoor soccer matches which take place in the community.

loans.use: To expand his workshop

loans.name: Samer

texts.en:
This borrower, Samer, is from Iraq. He is 23 years old and lives with four other members of his family.

In 2008, Samer decided to open his own barber shop after accumulating good experience in this field. He is well known in his local area and has a good reputation.

He is requesting a $3000 loan to redecorate his shop and to buy two air conditioners. He aims to improve his business and to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: redecorate his shop and buy two air conditioners

loans.name: Juan Javier

texts.es:
Juan Javier  Q. G. tiene 29 años, vive en unión libre y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 6 anos. El vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Juan es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.   

Juan cultiva cacao y arroz y tiene este negocio desde hace 1 año. El compra y vende sus productos en Matilde Esther. El solicita el crédito para ampliar las siembras de cacao y de arroz. El préstamo le ayudara a mejorar las cosechas. 

Sus metas para el futuro son tener un carro, una casa propia y una finca. 

El mayor desafío que el enfrenta en su negocio es la época de invierno, ya que en esa temporada las cosechas bajan bastante. 

En su tiempo libre le gusta descansar, jugar indoor y salir a las fiestas patronales.
texts.en:
Juan Javier Q. G. is 29 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and has two children aged 9 and 6.  He lives in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province. 

Juan is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new group is located in the community of Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.

Juan grows cacao and rice.  He has been in this business for one year.  He buys and sells his products in Matilde Esther.  He is requesting this loan to expand the cacao and rice crops that he grows.  The loan will help him to improve his harvests.  His goals for the future are to own a car, his own home and a farm.  The greatest challenge that he faces in his business is the winter season as, during this season, his harvests are considerably reduced.  In his spare time, Juan likes to relax, play indoor soccer and celebrate the local fiestas.

loans.use: To expand the cacao and rice crops that he grows

loans.name: Macmillan

texts.en:
Macmillan is a 52-year-old carpenter.  He is a father of four children who are aged 19, 22, 24 and 27. He has been running his business for the past 12 years in the Kibera slums in Nairobi.  

Being a member of Faulu Kenya, he has learned how to save his money.  This has helped him to improve his business and has managed to employ three people.  He has requested 80,000 Kes to buy timber, velvet, plywood, nails and block boards.

loans.use: To buy timber, velvet, plywood, nails and block boards

loans.name: Celinda Ines

texts.es:
Celinda Ines Y. G. tiene 42 años, es soltera y vive con sus padres en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Celinda Ines es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.   

Celinda Ines cría chanchos y ella tiene este negocio desde hace unos 3 años.  Ella solicita el crédito para ampliar la cría de chanchos. Ella compra y vende los chanchos en Matilde Esther. Gracias al crédito ella podrá mejorar su servicio.

En el futuro ella desea tener una finca y una casa propia. Su meta es mejorar su trabajo y superar en la venta de chanchos. 

Los desafíos que ella enfrenta son problemas de salud y una bajada de ventas en la época de invierno.
texts.en:
Celinda Ines Y. G. is 42 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

Celinda Ines is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new group is located in the community of Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.

Celinda Ines raises pigs and she has had her business for 3 years.  She is requesting this loan to expand her pig raising business.  She buys and sells her pigs in Matilde Esther.  This loan will enable her to improve her service.  In the future, she would like to own a farm and her own home.  Her goal is to improve her work and improve her pig sales.  The challenges she faces in her business are health problems and a lowering of sales during the winter season.

loans.use: To expand her pig raising business

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
Angel G. G. tiene 37 años y vive en unión libre en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Angel es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.   

Desde hace 3 años Angel se dedica a la siembra de yuca y cacao. El compra y vende sus productos en Matilde Esther. El solicita este crédito para comprar y sembrar más cacao y yuca. De esta manera el podrá mejorar su cosecha. 

Para el futuro Angel desea tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Angel G. G. is 37 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

Angel is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new group is located in the community of Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.


Angel has been growing cassava and cacao for 3 years.  He buys and sells his products in Matilde Esther.  He is requesting this loan so that he can buy and sow more cacao and cassava.  In this way he will be able to improve his harvest.  In the future, Angel would like to own his own home.

loans.use: To buy supplies

loans.name: Lida

texts.es:
Lida G. V. tiene 54 años, es viuda y tiene 6 hijos. Ella vive con sus hijos en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar.  

Lida es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.  

Lida sembra cacao y maíz y tiene este negocio desde hace 8 años. Ella compra y vende sus productos en Matilde Esther. Ella solicita el crédito para terminar de ampliar los huertos de cacao y sembrar maíz. Gracias al crédito ella podrá mejorar su producción. 

En el futuro ella desea tener una finca más grande, un carro y un local de compra y venta de productos. El mayor desafío que ella enfrenta en su negocio es la época de invierno cuando se baja la producción.

En su tiempo libre le gusta pasillos y descansar con su familia.
texts.en: Lida G. V. is 54, a widow, and has 6 children. She lives with her children in the Chillanes canton in Bolivar province. Lida is a member of the Unidos Somos Mas ["United, We Are More"] rural lending bank. This new bank is part of the Matilde Esther community in the Guayas province. This community is located 2 hours from the Chillanes office in the Bolivar province. The group has 23 members who have different jobs, for example in agriculture, raising livestock, and running small restaurants and cafeterias. Lida sows cocoa and corn, and has had this business for 8 years. She buys and sells her products in Matilde Esther. She is requesting this loan to finish expanding her cocoa plots and to sow corn. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to improve her production. In the future she wants to have a bigger farm, a car, and a store to sell and purchase products. Her greatest challenge is wintertime, when production decreases. In her spare time she likes going for walks and resting with her family.

loans.use: to finish expanding her cocoa plots and to sow corn

loans.name: Yurither

texts.en: Yurither is a 45-year-old widow with three children. She sells flowers to earn a living for her family. As the family's breadwinner, she works hard in her business and she hopes to expand it. So far, she has managed to improve her business through Faulu Kenya. She has requested a loan of 30,000 KES to buy more flowers.

loans.use: to buy more flowers

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CHIKON”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Edgar; el tiene 29 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio se dedica al negocio de transporte turístico el socio trabaja con turismo, el trabaja con diferentes agencias que le solicitan sus servicios de diferentes tours, lleva años en este negocio y le va muy bien, de esta forma el socio saca a su familia adelante.  

El socio solicita el préstamo para la mantención de su carro y para algunos gastos personales. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member belongs to the Chikon community bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, belonging to the Urubamba province in the Cusco department. The member is Mr. Edgar. He is 29, lives with his partner, and has 2 children. He has a tourist transportation business. He works in tourism, with different agencies who request his services for different tours. He has had this business for years and it is going very well. This is how he gets his family ahead. The member is requesting this loan for the maintenance of his car and for various personal costs. He is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of his quotas.

loans.use: He is requesting this loan for the maintenance of his care and for various personal expenses.

loans.name: Dugar

texts.es:
Dugar V. V. tiene 47 años y vive en unión libre. El vive con su conviviente y sus hijas en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Dugar es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.   

Dugar se dedica a la producción de cacao y naranjas. El tiene este comercio desde hace 8 años. Dugar compra y vende sus productos en Bucay.  El solicita este crédito para mejorar el sembrio de cacao y naranjas. Através de este crédito el desea mejorar el futuro de su familia.

Su sueño es tener terrenos propios y una casa propia. El desafío que el enfrenta en su negocio es la baja producción en época de invierno.

En su tiempo libre, aparte de descansar, le gusta jugar indoor y volley y salir a las fiestas patronales.
texts.en: Dugar V. V. is 47 and in a common-law marriage. He lives with his partner and children in the Chillanes canton in the province of Bolivar. Dugar is a member of the Unidos Somos Mas ["United We Are More"] rural lending bank. This new bank is part of the Matilde Esther community in the Guayas province. This community is located 2 hours from the Chillanes office in the Bolivar province. The group has 23 members who have various businesses such as agriculture, the raising of livestock, and small restaurants and cafeterias. Dugar is a member of the Unidos Somos Mas rural bank. This new bank is part of the Matilda Esther community in the Guayas province. This community is located 2 hours from the Chillanes office in the Bolivar province. The group has 23 members who have different businesses such as agriculture, the raising of livestock, and small restaurants and cafeterias. Dugar produces cocoa and oranges. He has had this business for 8 years. Dugar buys and sells his products in Bucay. He is requesting this loan to improve his cocoa and orange crops. Through this loan, he hopes to improve his family's future. His dream is to have his own land and his own house. The challenge that he encounters in his business is the low production in the wintertime. In his free time, aside from resting, he enjoys playing indoor soccer and volley ball, and celebrating the holidays.

loans.use: to improve the cocoa and orange crop

loans.name: Carlos Armando

texts.es:
Carlos Armando V. M. tiene 20 años, es soltero y vive con sus padres en el cantón de Babahoyo en la provincia de Los Ríos. 

Carlos Armando es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.  

Carlos Armando solicita este crédito para comenzar un negocio propio. Este crédito le ayudara incrementar sus ingresos y tener una mejor vida.

Su sueño es incrementar su negocio y tener mejor ingresos para poder ayudar en el hogar de sus padres. Aparte de la baja situación económica no enfrente desafíos en este momento. 

Su hobby es el ciclismo.
texts.en: Carlos Armando V. M. is 20, single, and lives with his parents in the Babahoyo canton in the Los Rios province. Carlos Armando is a member of the Unidos Somos Mas ["United We Are More"] rural lending bank. This new bank is part of the Matilde Esther community in the Guayas province. This community is located 2 hours from the Chillanes office in the Bolivar province. The group has 23 members who have various businesses such as agriculture, the raising of livestock, and small restaurants and cafeterias. Carlos Armando is requesting this loan to start his own business. This loan will help him to increase his income and have a better life. His dream is to grow his business and have a better income in order to be able to help out in his parents' home. Apart from the low economic situation, he does not have any challenges at the moment. His hobby is cycling.

loans.use: to start his own business

loans.name: Erik Roger

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CHIKON”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Erick Royer; el tiene 36 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio se dedica al negocio de restaurante el socio trabaja todos los días brindando el servicio de almuerzo y cena, a la vez el socio trabaja en un colegio de Urubamba como docente siendo estas dos actividades las que realiza el socio para el sustento de su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos como arroz, azúcar, menestras entre otros mas para su 
negocio. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Erik Royer is a member of the community bank, Chikon. The bank is located in the Urubamba district of the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Erik is 36 years old, is married, and has three children. He works every day in a restaurant which offers both lunch and dinner. He also teaches at a school in Urubamba. He does all of this in order to support his family.

He has requested this loan in order to purchase supplies for his business such as rice, sugar, and grains, among other items. He is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: This bank member has requested the loan in order to purchase supplies for his business such as rice, sugar, and grains, among other items.

loans.name: María Etelvina

texts.es:
María Etelvina E. L. tiene 64 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 30, 27, 25 y 24 años. Ella vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

María Etelvina es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.  

María Etelvina produce arroz desde hace 4 años. Ella compra y vende sus productos en Matilde Esther. Ella solicita el crédito para comprar siembras de arroz. Gracias a este crédito ella podrá mejorar la producción de la cosecha. 

Su meta para el futuro es tener más terrenos para trabajar y que sean sus terrenos propios. La mayor desafió que ella enfrenta en su negocio es la época de invierno. Si no se siembra a tiempo no se cosecha.

Le gusta dedicar su tiempo libre a sus cosas personales.
texts.en: María Etelvina E. L. is 64, married, and has 4 children ages 30, 27, 25 and 24. She lives in the Chillanes canton in the Bolivar province. Maria Etelvina is a member of the Unidos Somos Mas ["United We Are More"] rural lending bank. This new bank is part of the Matilde Esther community in the Guayas province. This community is located 2 hours from the Chillanes office in the Bolivar province. The group has 23 members who have various businesses such as agriculture, the raising of livestock, and small restaurants and cafeterias. Maria Etelvina has produced rice for 4 years. She purchases and sells her products in Matilde Esther. She is requesting this loan to purchase rice. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to improve the production of her harvest. Her goal for the future is to have more of her own lands to work. The greatest challenge that she confronts in her business is the winter season; if she does not sow in time, she does not harvest. She enjoys spending her free time on personal things.

loans.use: to purchase rice

loans.name: Kyamazima Twimuke Group

texts.en: John is a 54-year-old ambitious married man with nine children living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His ambition is to set up a tea estate. For 30 years, he has been selling charcoal and the business has helped him educate four of his children. His mission is to own a store and operate from one area. He is a member of Kyamazima Twimuke group, where each member guarantees the others' loans. John needs the loan to buy charcoal for resale.

loans.use: to buy charcoal

loans.name: Maria Elena Mollano Group

texts.es: José U. es el secretario del grupo Marielena Moyano. Este grupo de 12 integrantes escogió su nombre en honor de una heroína peruana.  José U. de 48 años de edad casado y con tres hijos de los cuales uno aun es menor de edad,  tiene un negocio en que prepara buffet para eventos sociales, comenzó con este negocio hace mas de 6 años a raíz de que no avía este tipo de servicios en la zona donde vive, con el tiempo le gustaría ampliar su negocio a otros distritos y así poder expandirse y ser  más conocido su negocio, con el reciente préstamo lo invertirá en compra de mercadería como bandejas y utensilios de cocina. Así como el señor José U. cada integrante de este grupo tiene una meta por cumplir y un desafío por realizar el cual es la mejoría económica en sus hogares y un negocio estable.
texts.en:
José U. is the secretary of the 'Marielena Moyano' group.  This group has 12 members and they chose their name in honor of a Peruvian heroine.

José U. is 48 years old, married and has three children, one of whom is still a minor.  He has a business in which he prepares buffets for social events.  He started out in this business more than 6 years ago as this type of service didn't exist in his area.  Over time, he would like to expand his business in other districts.  This will enable him to expand and enable his business to become more well known.  José U. will invest his loan in buying merchandise such as trays and cooking utensils.

Just like José U., every member of this group has a goal to achieve and a challenge in improving their household finances and maintaining a stable business.

loans.use: To buy trays and cooking utensils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To continue planting cacao and to start planting cassava too

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac District of the province of Calca. She is 45 years old, married and has four children. 

Florencia is requesting the loan to invest in her handicrafts business in Pisac. She will take her handicrafts to Chile and Bolivia to sell on a frequent basis. With the loan, she plans on buying more inventory for her business.

She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in her handicrafts business

loans.name: Silvia Indaura

texts.es:
Silvia Indaura C. B. tiene 31 años, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos de 14, 11 y 9 años. Ella vive con sus hijos en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Silvia Inalvra es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.  

Silvia Inalvra tiene su negocio de sembrio de yuca y cría de pollo desde hace 1 año. Ella compra y vende sus productos en Matilde Esther. Ella solicita este crédito para ampliar su negocio y para mejorar el servicio.

Sus metas para el futuro son tener su casa propia y su negocio propio con que pueda salir adelante. Los desafíos que ella enfrenta son pequeños problemas de salud y la época de invierno cuando no hay cosechas. 

En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar indoor, bailar y cantar. También disfruta salir a la fiesta del pueblo que se celebra cada 8 de diciembre.
texts.en:
Silvia Indaura C. B. is 31 years old.  She is a widow and has 3 children aged 14, 11, 9.  She lives with her children in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

Silvia is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new loan group is located in Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office, in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in a number of different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.

Silvia has a business growing cassava and raising chickens.  She has had her business for one year.  She buys and sells her products in Matilde Esther.  Silvia is requesting this loan to expand her business and improve her service.  Her goals for the future are to own her own home and business with which she can get ahead in life.  The challenges that she faces are small health problems and the winter season when there are no harvests.  In her spare time she likes to play indoor soccer, to dance and to sing.  She enjoys celebrating the local fiesta which takes place every 8th of December.

loans.use: To expand her business and improve her service

loans.name: Estuardo

texts.es:
Estuardo G. V. tiene 53 años, vive en unión libre y tiene 7 hijos (28, 27, 26, 25, 20, 13 y 12 años). El vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Estuardo es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.  

Estuardo se dedica a la producción de cacao y naranjas. El tiene este comercio desde hace 6 años. El compra y vende sus productos en Matilde Esther. El solicita este crédito para poder sembrar mas plantas de cacao y de naranja. El crédito le ayudara a mejorar sus tierras y cosechas. 

Lo que ha soñado toda su vida es tener más terrenos y un buen carro. La época de invierno es la temporada más difícil para Estuardo porque en ese momento no hay producción.

En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar volley y salir a las fiestas patronales.
texts.en:
Estuardo G. V. is 53 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and has 7 children aged 28, 27, 26, 25, 20, 13 and 12.  He lives in  Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

Estuardo is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new loan group is located in Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office, in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in a number of different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.

Estuardo farms cacao and oranges.  He has been in this business for 6 years.  He buys and sells his products in Matilde Esther.  Estuardo is requesting this loan so that he can sow more cacao and orange plants.  The loan will help him to improve his land and his harvests.  He has dreamed all his life of owning more land and a good car.  The winter season is the most difficult season for Estuardo as there is no production over the winter.  In his spare time, he likes to play volleyball and celebrate the fiestas of the local patron saint.

loans.use: To sow more cacao and orange plants

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Margarita, and she is 42 years old.  Margarita is single and has five children.  She is dedicated to her food sales business.  She will make the foods (such as soups) in her home and then sell them on the streets in Pisac. She also brings and sells lunches to a business called Copesco in Pisac. (Note that photo was taken in a village bank meeting in a handicraft store.)

She is very happy with the loan granted and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in her food sales business

loans.name: Lenet

texts.en: Lenet is a member of Achievers group in Faulu Kenya. She runs a grocery shop in the Kawangare open-air market in Nairobi West. She is married and has a 12-year-old child. Through Faulu Kenya, she has managed to transform her business into wholesale. She dreams of becoming a big supplier in the future. She has requested a 60,000 KES loan to buy mangoes for resale.

loans.use: to buy mangoes

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Aurelia and she is 36 years old. Aurelia is married and has three children. She requesting the loan to invest in more inventory for her handicraft business in Pisac. She sells typical Peruvian handicrafts to the tourists visiting the Pisac ruins in the Pisac fair.  

She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in Handicraft Business

loans.name: Karin Group

texts.es: Jessica L. es una de las integrantes de la alcancía comunal Karin conformada por siete miembros los cuales todos radican en el distrito de Lurigancho – Chosica. Una alcancía con grandes valores  y dedicación en cada puesto de trabajo en los que se desempeñan, así se caracteriza este grupo comunal. Jessica L. de 36 años de edad tiene 2 hijos que a un depende de ella por lo cual decidió hace ya cuatro años abrir un salón de belleza, El cual le ha dado mucha estabilidad económica para ella y para su hogar, ella comenzó en este negocio a raíz de que recibió el apoyo de su esposo pudiendo así abrir un salón de belleza en su propia casa. A su vez también venden productos de belleza hace no más de dos años, este trabajo le a podido dar satisfacciones como la financiación de la educación de sus hijos y mejoras para su casa. Con el reciente préstamo piensa invertirlo en productos de belleza y mejoras  para su local de trabajo.
texts.en:
Jessica L. is a member of the Karin community bank.  The bank has seven members who all live in Lurigancho - Chosica district.  All of the members of this group display great courage and commitment in the businesses that they carry out.  The community bank is characterized by these traits.

Jessica L. is 36 years old and has 2 dependent children.  Four years ago she decided to set up a beauty salon.  This business has provided herself and her household with a lot of financial stability.  She started out in this business with her husband's support.  She was able to open a beauty salon in her own home.  Jessica L. has also been selling beauty products for two years.  This work has enabled her to pay for her children's education and to make improvements to her home which has been very satisfying for her.  She will invest this loan in buying beauty products and making improvements to her work premises.

loans.use: To buy beauty products

loans.name: Adrian Bladimir

texts.es:
Adrian Bladimir S. S. tiene 21 años y vive en unión libre en el cantón de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. 

Adrian Bladimir es miembro de la ventanilla rural Unidos Somos Más. Esta nueva ventanilla hace parte de la comunidad Matilde Esther en la provincia de Guayas. Esta comunidad esta ubicada a 2 horas de la oficina de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolívar. El grupo cuenta con 23 socios y se dedican a diferentes actividades como agricultura, cría de ganados y pequeños restaurantes y comedores.   

Adrian Bladimir tiene un soda bar. El abrió su negocio hace 3 años. El compra sus productos en Matilde Esther. Con este crédito Adrian Bladimir desea ampliar su negocio de soda bar y poner comidas rápidas. El crédito le ayudara a mejorar el servicio. 

Su meta para el futuro es tener una casa propia y un negocio propio ya que ahora vive arrendando. Los desafíos que el enfrenta en su negocio son algunos problemas económicos y la bajada de ventas en invierno. 

En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar indoor y descansar. También disfruta la fiesta del pueblo cada 8 de diciembre.
texts.en:
Adrian Bladimir S. S. is 21 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

Adrian Bladimir is a member of the 'Unidos Somos Más' (United We Are Stronger) rural loan group.  This new loan group is located in Matilde Esther, in Guayas province, 2 hours from our Chillanes office, in Bolívar province.  The group has 23 members who work in a number of different business activities such as farming, livestock raising and running small restaurants and eateries.

Adrian Bladimir has a soda bar.  He opened his business 3 years ago.  He buys his products in Matilde Esther.  Adrian Bladimir will use this loan to expand his business and to start serving fast food.  The loan will help him to improve his service.  His goal for the future is to own his own home and business as he is currently renting.  The challenges that he faces in his business are financial problems and the fall in sales over the winter.  In his spare time he likes to play indoor soccer and relax.  He also enjoys celebrating the local fiesta every 8th of December.

loans.use: To support his soda bar business and to start selling fast food

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra forma parte del banco comunal “Rayito de Sol” perteneciente a la ciudad de Chillán.  Ella se dedica a la producción y venta de dulces, queques, pan amasado y harina tostada, y la venta de ropa de lencería, desde hace 8 años. Su forma de venta es de manera ambulante y también por encargos. Trabaja de jueves a domingo. 
Con este préstamo comprará materiales para la elaboración de sus productos. 
Vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijas, de 10  y 6 años y su bebé de  8 meses. 
Su sueño es tener un carro en su casa para trabajar cerca de sus hijas y así poder cuidarlas. 
Para Sandra, los préstamos de Fondo Esperanza han sido de gran apoyo para salir adelante con su negocio y de esta  manera aportar a la economía de su familia.
Chillán es una comuna de la zona centro sur de Chile. Su nombre significa “silla del sol” en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches. Chillán es conocida como “Cuna de la Patria” o “Tierra de Artistas”, debido a que en la ciudad han nacido destacados personajes de la historia de Chile, como por ejemplo el conocido pianista Claudio Arrau.
texts.en:
Sandra is a member of the "Rayito de Sol" (Little Ray of Sun) community bank, in the city of Chillán.  Her business is making and selling sweet treats, cakes, hand-made bread and toasted flour.  She also sells lingerie.  She has been in this business for 8 years.  She makes her sales as an itinerant street vendor and also accepts orders.  Sandra works from Thursday to Sunday.  She will use this loan to buy supplies for making her products.  

Sandra lives with her husband and 3 daughters who are 10 years old, 6 years old and 8 months old.  Her dream is to have a sales location in her home so that she can work near her daughters and be able to look after them.  For Sandra, loans from Fondo Esperanza have been a great support in getting ahead in her business and have helped her to support her family financially.

Chillán is a town in the southern-central area of Chile.  The name means 'chair of the sun' in Mapundungun, the language of our Mapuche native inhabitants.  Chillán is known as 'Cuna de la Patria” (Birthplace of the Nation) or “Tierra de Artistas” (Land of Artists) owing to the fact that it is the birthplace of a number of prominent characters in Chile's history such as, for example, the well-known pianist Claudio Arrau.

loans.use: To buy supplies

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana forma parte del banco comunal “El Esfuerzo”,  perteneciente a la ciudad de Talcahuano. Ella tiene una peluquería establecida en una calle principal de su ciudad, desde hace 6 años, en donde tiene 3 personas a su cargo. 
Con este préstamo comprará materiales para realizar su trabajo, en mayores cantidades, ya que durante la época navideña y de año nuevo tendrá mucho trabajo. 
Tiene dos hijos, pero vive solo con su hija menor y su marido, quien la apoya también económicamente. 
A Juana le ha sido muy grato participar de las reuniones de  Fondo Esperanza, junto a sus compañeros y a su asesora, ya que el ambiente es muy acogedor y solidario entre ellos. Juntos realizan actividades de apoyo para todos, como por ejemplo “canastas familiares” (alimentos no perecibles) y rifas entre otras cosas. También a Juana le ha servido mucho lo que aprendió durante una reunión sobre cómo organizar su dinero. 
Talcahuano es una comuna y ciudad-puerto de la región del Bíobío, al sur de Chile. Es conocida como uno de los principales puertos del país. Su nombre en mapudungun (lengua mapuche) significa "cielo tronador". Posee un paisaje natural  muy atractivo, debido a la combinación de ríos, mar, planicies fértiles, vegas y los cuerpos montañosos, con una hermosa vegetación. Su economía gira en torno a su puerto, su Base Naval, y un importante barrio industrial con empresas siderúrgicas, refinería de petróleo, petroquímica, cemento, gas, etc.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the "El Esfuerzo" (The Effort) community bank which is located in the city of Talcahuano.  Juana has owned an established hairdressing salon in a main street of her city for 6 years.  She employs 3 people.  She will use this loan to buy larger quantities of supplies for carrying out her work since, during the Christmas and New Year periods, she will have a lot of work.

Juana has two children but she lives alone with her youngest daughter and her husband who also supports the family financially.  Juana is pleased to have participated in Fondo Esperanza's meetings together with her fellow group members and her advisor since the atmosphere is very welcoming and supportive.  Together the group's members carry out activities which support all members of the group such as, for example, preparing "family hampers" (non-perishable food) and raffles, etc.  Juana has also benefited a lot from what she has learned during the meetings, above all how to manage her money.

Talcahuano is a port city in Bíobío region, in the south of Chile.  It is known as one of the main ports in the country.  Its name in Mapudungun (Mapuche language) means 'thundering sky'.  It has a very beautiful natural landscape owing to the combination of rivers, sea, fertile plains, meadows and mountains which have a beautiful vegetation.  The city's economy revolves around its port, its naval base and an important industrial neighborhood with iron and steel companies, oil refineries, petrochemical, cement and gas companies, etc.

loans.use: To buy hairdressing supplies

loans.name: Daisy

texts.es:
Daisy forma parte del banco comunal “Creciendo hacia el Futuro” de la ciudad de Rancagua.  Ella tiene un kiosco en un colegio de la ciudad, el cual atiende desde hace 1 año. También ofrece servicios de banquetería y comida típica en una parte del terreno de su casa, desde hace unos 10 años. Daisy le da trabajo a su prima para que le ayude en sus dos negocios y a una compañera,  cuando tiene que atender algún evento. Todas son parte de Fondo Esperanza. Además cocina, para vender en esta época de Navidad, pan de pascua y pavos asados, por encargos. A fines de diciembre reemplazará los pavos por mote con huesillos. 
La casa de Daisy, la cual es muy antigua, sufrió varios daños debido al terremoto del pasado 27 de febrero, por lo que la está reparando de a poco. 
Con este préstamo comprará cerámica para su cocina,  alimentos  e ingredientes para preparar sus productos.
Daisy trabaja todos los días de la semana y es el único sustento económico de su hogar. Tiene una hija que está en 3º año de la universidad y estudia ingeniería comercial. 
Su sueño es hacer un centro de eventos en su casa, ya que por la extensión del terreno que ocupa, tendría capacidad para atender a 200 personas. Ahora por falta de infraestructura, puede atender solo a 50 personas.
Para Daisy Fondo Esperanza ha sido un gran apoyo material y emocional, ya que gracias a los préstamos ha mantenido su negocio.
Rancagua pertenece a la región del Libertador Bernardo O´Higgins. Es una moderna ciudad que regula el principal proceso productivo y exportador agrofrutícola y vitivinícola de Chile. Es también una ciudad minera, debido a que en su cordillera se encuentra la mina subterránea más grande del mundo “El Teniente”, con 4.500 km. de túneles.
texts.en:
Daisy is a member of the "Creciendo hacia el Futuro" (Growing towards the Future) community bank which is located in the city of Rancagua.  She has a kiosk in a local school where she has been working for 1 year.  She has also been offering catering services and traditional meals on her property for 10 years.

Daisy employs her cousin to help her in her two businesses and a friend when she has to serve at an event.  They are all members of Fondo Esperanza.  Daisy also bakes panettone and roast turkey to order to sell during the Christmas period.  At the beginning of December, she replaces her turkeys with 'mote con huesillos' (a traditional Chilean summer drink).

Daisy's home, which is very old, suffered damage in the February 27th earthquake and she is repairing it bit by bit.  She will use this loan to buy ceramics for her kitchen and food and ingredients for preparing her products.  Daisy works every day of the week and she is the only one who financially supports her household.  She has a daughter who is in her third year at university, studying commercial engineering.

Daisy's dream is to set up an events center in her home because her plot of land is large and she would have room for 200 people.  Right now, as she lacks infrastructure, she can only serve 50 people.  For Daisy, Fondo Esperanza has been a great material and emotional support since their loans have enabled her to keep her business running.

The city of Rancagua is located in Libertador Bernardo O'Higgins region.  It is a modern city that controls the main production and export process for Chilean agricultural and wine products.  It is also a mining city.  The biggest underground mine in the world, 'El Teniente' is found in its mountain range, with 4,500km of tunnels.

loans.use: Ceramics, food and ingredients

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Alicia and she is 29 years old. Alicia is single and has one child. She is requesting the loan to invest in her convenience store in Pisac. She will sell a variety of different daily necessities in her convenience store, from milk to potatoes, cookies, chips, soda, and juices.

She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in convenience store.

loans.name: Ceferina

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

Her name is Ceferina, and she is 57 years old. Ceferina is a widow and has one child. She is requesting the loan to invest in more food products for her food sales business. She makes food in her home and sells the dishes in the Pisac market to the people who come to shop.

She is very happy with the loan granted and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in food sales business.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Pro Desarrollo” cooperative bank, located in the Pisac district of the province of Calca.

His name is Alfredo and he is 43 years old. He is married and has three children. He is planning to use the loan to invest in his transportation business.  Several times a week he will transport goods from Pisac to Calca or Urubamba in the Sacred Valley.

He is very happy with the loan granted and commits to making his payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in transportation business.

loans.name: Sarita Colonia Group

texts.es: Rigoberto Dionisio pertenece  a la alcancía comunal  Sarita Colonia compuesta  por siete integrantes que se dedican a  diversos comercios  pero teniendo en común el deseo de superación y de salir adelante por el bienestar de sus familias. Rigoberto Dionisio  de 51 años de edad casado y con tres hijos de los cuales  dos son independientes y  uno aun esta a su cuidado. El se dedica al negocio de cabina de internet hace más de cinco años, El cual inicio con alquiler de juegos de video,  con el negocio de cabinas de internet a logrado mejorar su casa y dar mayores comodidades a su hogar así también  cubrir gastos como alimentación y estudios para sus hijos. En el futro le gustaría expandir su negocio a otros lugares para así poder generar mayores ingresos. Con el presente préstamo  piensa comprar herramientas para su negocio como son teclados y monitores. Un grupo con el solo objetivo de mejorar sus condiciones económicas es lo que caracteriza a esta alcancía comunal Sarita Colonia.
texts.en:
Rigoberto Dionisio belongs to the 'Sarita Colonia' community bank which has seven members who work in a different businesses but who share the common goal of improving themselves and getting ahead for the well-being of their families.

Rigoberto Dionisio is 51 years old, married and has three children.  Two of his children live independently and one is still in his care.  Rigoberto has been in the business of providing Internet access through his Internet terminals for more than five years.  He started his business renting out video games.  His business has enabled him to improve his home and provide it with more conveniences.  He is also able to cover food expenses and pay for his children's studies.  In the future, he would like to expand his business to other places so that he can make more profits.  He will use his current loan to buy tools for his business such as keyboards and monitors.

The sole aim of this group is to improve their financial conditions.  It is what characterizes the 'Sarita Colonia' community bank.

loans.use: To buy keyboards and monitors

loans.name: Mark

texts.en:
Mark M. has been in the pool business for 22 years.  His in-laws pulled him into the business just as the technology was changing and the industry was growing.  Mark worked for the family business for a while and then started another business with a friend.  When the economy tanked, he decided to reduce his overhead costs and open his own business, Floppy Hat Pool Service.  He has had some of the same customers the entire time he has been in the pool business.  At the moment he has 70 different clients that he goes to regularly and has had as many as 108.  He is the only employee, so his 70 clients keep him extremely busy.  He is looking to hire another employee starting in April because he is expecting to have more customers in the high season.

Mark found out about ACCION Texas-Louisiana through a small business development advisor who had helped him with business issues in the past.  Mark had set a hard date to open Floppy Hat, whether he had a loan or not.  When he got in touch with ACCION, he told his loan officer that he was working with a short time frame.  He was grateful for the guidance from ACCION and was ecstatic when he received the loan before opening the business.  The loan gave him the working capital to allow Floppy Hat to take off.  Mark was able to go straight to his distributor and buy products to sell to his clients.  He was also able to pay for basic operating costs such as his insurance and worker’s compensation.  

Mark describes himself as a workaholic, but hopes to have someone working under him in the future.  He wants to have more time for other things.  He would love to be able to spend more time with his four grandchildren and to play his trombone.  

Mark believes it is important to watch overhead costs and to only spend the money that the small business has.  Mark’s motto is that “hard work never hurt anybody.”  He enjoys working hard and seeing how all that hard work pays off.

loans.use: buying wholesale products and for operating costs

loans.name: Acuario Group

texts.es: Un grupo con buenas ideas D. trabajo y muy empeñosos al realizarlos, así se caracteriza la alcancía comunal Acuario conformada por siete integrantes que viven en el distrito D. Vitarte. Una historia en particular es D. la Sra. Melva  C. D. 57 años D. edad casada y con tres hijos, ella se dedica al alquiler D. cuartos en su casa hace más D. 14 años y a su vez tiene una movilidad que renta para transporte público. Comienza en este trabajo a raíz D. que tiene una casa amplia y tenía muchos cuartos desocupados es así que deciD. alquilarlos para así poder generar ingresos y con el tiempo y mucho esfuerzo a podido implementar su hogar y darse una estabilidad económica, como así también estudios para sus hijos. En el futuro le gustaría tener un puesto D. venta D. lubricantes para autos. No puedo concluir sin antes mencionar el esfuerzo y la dedicación que realiza cada integrante D. este grupo para el bienestar y mejoría económica para sus familias.
texts.en: A group with good ideas and who work very hard to realize them-- this is how to describe the Acuario Community Bank, maD. up of seven members who live in the Vitarte district. One special story is that of Mrs. Melva C., age 57, who is married with three children. She has rented rooms in her house for over 14 years and also has a vehicle that she rents for public transportation. She started this business because she has a large house with many unoccupied rooms, so she decided to rent them out in order to generate an income. With time and a lot of work she was able to start this business and gain economic stability and an education for her children. In the future she would like to have a store to sell auto lubricant. We cannot concluD. this description without mentioning the hard work and dedication of each member of this group to the well-being and financial improvement of  their families.

loans.use: to improve the rooms that she rents.

loans.name: Fanny Janethe

texts.es:
Fanny de 35 años, es una mujer trabajadora que es profesora parvulario y vende productos de uso personal marca Avon. Viviendo en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso hace tiempo ha trabajado para poder mantener a su hijo ya que está separada de su esposo.   

Trabaja de lunes a viernes como profesora en una escuela y los fines de semana vende  productos de uso personal Avon a sus amigas y conocidas. Tiene muchas aspiración para su hijos por eso quiere continuar trabajando para generar dinero y asi darle una buena vida a su hijo. 

Ella quiere construir mejor su casa por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo cemento, arena, bloques, pintura para comenzar el año con su casa arreglada. En el futuro quiere seguir trabajando  y terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en: Fanny, age 35, is a hard-working woman who is a primary teacher and sells Avon personal products. She has lived in a periurban zone called Paraiso for some time and has worked in order to maintain her child, as she is separated from her husband. She works Mondays to Fridays as a teacher in a school, and on weekends she sells Avon personal products to her friends and acquaintances. She has many goals for her children, so she wants to continue working to generate money and give her child a good life. She wants to improve her house, and so she wants to use this loan to buy cement, sand, blocks and paint in order to start off the year with her house in order. For the future, she wants to continue to work and finish building her house.

loans.use: cement, sand, stones

loans.name: Keur Sambou 2 Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois de KEUR SAMBOU 2 vient de recevoir son premier financement avec CAURIE-MF. Il est composé de 42 femmes qui sont toutes du même village. 

Madame MARIEME S., debout à l'extrême droite sur la photo et mise en médaillon est présidente du Banc Villageois. Elle est âgée de 53 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants. 

Elle fait principalement de l'élevage, comme activité parallèle elle fait du petit commerce de produits divers, tels de l'arachide, niébé etc.. 

Son premier crédit avec CAURIE-MF lui permettra de mieux développer son activité. 

Son objectif est de constituer une bonne épargne afin de prétendre à un prochain prêt plus important.
texts.en:
Composed of 42 women who are all from the same village, the Banc Villageois of KEUR SAMBOU 2 has just received its first financing with CAURIE-MF.  Ms. MARIEME S. (standing at the far right in the photo and appearing in the cameo) is the president of the Banc Villageois.  She is 53 years old, married, and a mother of five children.  She mainly raises livestock.  On the side, she has small business involving a variety of goods, such as peanuts, black-eyed peas, etc.  

Her first loan with CAURIE-MF will enable her to develop her business further.  Her goal is to save up a good amount of money in order to aspire to a larger subsequent loan.

loans.use: Buying a sheep to fatten

loans.name: Los Progresistas De Cupiche Group

texts.es: “Los Progresistas de Cupiche”, es un grupo conformado por 8 personas muy emprendedoras cada uno con diferentes actividades pero un solo objetivo, el cuál es trabajar mucho para lograr el progreso de  de cada una de sus familias, tal es el caso de Julia Teodora quien tiene 42 años de edad y se dedica a preparar tortas para vender, actualmente está  especializándose en repostería, también tiene un mini bazar en el cuál vende regalos, cosméticos, adornos y gaseosas,  gracias a su esfuerzo y  trabajo ayudó a su esposo a construir su casa, mejorar su negocio y darles educación superior a sus hijos mayores y el ultimo de sus hijos se está preparando en una academia para ingresar  a la universidad. Julia Teodora solicitó el préstamo a EDAPROSPO para comprar los artículos que le hace falta en su mini bazar como son: adornos, regalos, cosméticos e ingredientes para preparar tortas. Ella sueña con poner una pastelería en su casa. En la fotografía podemos apreciar a los socios de la alcancía comunal en el negocio de Julia Teodora con sus hijos en brazos en el momento del desembolso.
texts.en:
“Los Progresistas de Cupiche” is a group made up of 8 very enterprising people, each one with a different job but only one goal: to work hard in order to achieve progress for their entire family. Such is the case of Julia Teodora, who is 42 and makes pies to sell. She currently specializes in desserts, and also has a mini bazaar where she sells gifts, cosmetics, decorations and pop. Thanks to her hard work she has helped her husband to build their home, improve their business and give their older children higher education. Their oldest child is studying in an academy in preparation for entering university.
Julia Teodora is requesting this loan from EDAPROSPO to purchase the articles that she needs in her mini bazaar, such as: decorations, gifts, cosmetics and ingredients for making pies. She dreams of opening a bakery in her home. In the photo we can see the members of the community ban in Julia Teodora's store. Julia Teodora has her children in her arms in the photo.

loans.use: gifts, decorations, cosmetics and ingredients for pies

loans.name: Ciudad Real Group

texts.es: Rufino Martínez tiene 45 años de edad y vive en el distrito de Santa Anita tiene un hijo de 18 años de edad el cual aun esta a su cuidado y le brinda los pagos para sus estudios, Rufino cada día se dedica al manejo de transporte público hace mas de 12 años y comenzó  a ráiz de que un familiar le propuso comprar una pequeña movilidad a un bajo precio ya que era un vehículo usado. Es así como comienza en este trabajo de chofer de su propio vehículo el cual le a dado muchas satisfacciones económicas y poder sustentar su hogar y darle estudios a su hijo que prontamente entrara  a la universidad, en el futuro le gustaría dejar este trabajo y poner una carnicería. Con el reciente préstamo lo invertirá en pintar su vehículo y pasar unas revisiones técnicas. Como el señor Rufino Martínez cada integrante de esta agrupación tiene una meta a futuro y un gran deseo por salir adelante y poder dar a sus hogares la mejor estabilidad económica posible.
texts.en:
Rufino Martínez is 45 years old and lives in Santa Anita district.  He has an 18 year-old son who is still in his care and he pays for his studies.  Rufino works as a public transport driver every day.  He has been in this work for more than 12 years.  He started his business when a family member suggested he buy a small vehicle which was available at a low price as it was a used vehicle.  This is how he started his work driving his own vehicle.  This business has been very rewarding financially and has enabled him to support his household and educate his son who will soon start university.  In the future, he would like to leave this business and set up a butcher's shop.

Rufino will use this loan to invest in having his vehicle painted and having some technical checks done on it.  Just like Rufino Martínez, each member of this group has a future goal and a great desire to get ahead and provide their households with the best financial stability possible.

loans.use: To have his vehicle painted and to have some technical checks done on it

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy food products.  To buy supplies for making meals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy scaffolding for painting buildings

loans.name: Diosleida Bertalina

texts.es:
Diosleida de 29 años, ha trabajado con esfuerzo y dedicación durante años para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Viviendo en una zona  periurbana llamada Paraíso comenzó con la tienda para poder mantener a su familia y ayudar a su esposo. 

Vendiendo con pocos víveres en la parte delantera de su casa completo el dinero para ubicar su pequeña tienda en su casa. Vende caramelos, cachitos, arroz, bebidas etc. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 19h00pm todos los días. 

Para poder seguir con su negocio quiere comprar aceite, azúcar, arroz y una vitrina pequeña, en el futuro quiere tener suficiente dinero para darle una buena vida a su hijo.
texts.en: Diosleida, age 29, has worked hard with great dedication for years to help her husband with the household costs. She lives in a periurban zone called Paraiso. She started up her store in order to maintain her family and help her husband. She sold a few groceries in the front of her house. Her small store is located in her home. She sells candy, croissants, rice, drinks, etc. She works from 7 am to 7 pm every day. In order to continue running her business she wants to buy oil, sugar, rice and a small display case. In the future she wants to have enough money to give her son a good life.

loans.use: oil, sugar, rice

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: La Sra. Sofía se dedica a la elaboración de prendas originarias para flete o alquiler para danzas, ella se dedica a esta actividad desde muy joven de este modo genera ingresos para ayudar a su familia y también para sus estudios su domicilio se encuentra en una zona muy alejada en Quillacollo Zona Saja Pampa cuenta con una maquina industrial de costura una Over lock, vive en casa de sus padres que no cuentan con recursos para hacerle estudiar por esta razón ella trabaja, en esta temporada no existe mucha demanda de sus artículos pero ella quiere abastecerse de materia prima comprando telas e hilos con el dinero del crédito para cuando llegue la época alta y ya cuente con productos elaborados, es un apersona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en: Mrs. Sofía makes traditional clothing articles on order or to rent for dances. She has done this work since she was very young and this is how she generates income to help her family, and also for her studies. Her home is in a very remote zone in Quillacollo Zona Saja Pampa. She has an Over lock industrial sewing machine. She lives in her parents' home, and they do not have the resources to let her study. For this reason, she works. At the moment there is not a great demand for her clothing, but she wants to stock up on materials, buying fabric and threads with the money from this loan so that when the season of high demand comes she will already have products made. She is a very hard-working person and is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: the purchase of fabric and thread for making uniforms for the beginning of classes

loans.name: La Reforma 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Alexandra is the coordinator of her group named La Reforma 1 & 2 (Reform). She has a long term partner, four children and lives in San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries. The main economic activity here is the free trading zone, a cement factory, and other businesses. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

For around seven years Alexandra has operated a colmado, a shop where you can find basic food staples. Colmados are within short walking distances from neighborhood homes. She started her business with a loan she receive from a friend. She plans to use this loan to buy rice, flour and other foods. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business, like her other eight loans. She wants to work. She says, "now I have the strength to work harder. For my future, I want to have a better life, to live tranquil and safe.

Alexandra says that her biggest goal is to have her own house. In the meantime, she plans to continue enjoying to survive and to serve with her business. Her story is generally representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sugar, flour, oil, etc.

loans.name: Mame Fatou Wade Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois de MAME FATOU W. a vu le jour lors de son premier financement le 27 Décembre 2010. Il est composé de 40 femmes du même quartier. Elles ont monté leur Banc Villageois par proximité et par relaition de solidarité. 

Madame MAME DIOR C. debout à gauche sur la photo et mise en médaillon est présidente du Banc Villageois. Elle est âgée de 35 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants en charge.

Elle fait un petit commercer de tissus et de parfums. 

Le nouveau prêt contracté auprès de CAURIE-MF lui permettra de mieux se lancer dans ce domaine d'activité 

Son objectif est de participer à la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois "Mame Fatou W." was set up on December 27, 2010, when it entered its first loan cycle. It is composed of 40 members, all living in the same neighborhood. They have set up their Banc Villageois due to ties of neighborhood and solidarity.

Mrs Mame Dior C., standing left in the photo with the locket, chairs the Banc Villageois. She is 35 years old, married and the mother of two children in her care. She has a small cloth and perfume store. Her new loan with Caurie Microfinance will enable her to better progress in this activity. Her objective is to participate in household expenses.

loans.use: To buy cloth and perfume

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 55 años, vive con su esposo en su casa propia y tiene 3 hijos, los cuales ya son adultos y con familia. Rosa tiene una librería ubicado en el primer ambiente de su casa, ahí vende todo tipo de papelería como: cartulinas, láminas, hojas, asimismo ofrece envases descartables. De esta manera se genera utilidades adicionales, ya que trabaja como empleada. Es por ello, en cuanto termina sus labores de mucama, con mucha prisa retorna a su hogar para atender su negocio. Como sus clientes saben y reconocen de su buen trato;  no dudan en esperarlo hasta a veces  realizan  sus compras el día anterior. Con estas ganancias más el apoyo reiterado de ustedes hizo que revistiera las paredes de su casa, por la  que Rosa, se siente muy contenta ya que pudo remodelar las instalaciones de su negocio. En adelante desea ampliar su negocio, con la venta  de cervezas y gaseosas. Es su noveno crédito con MFP, y sabe que este aporte que solicita le será de gran utilidad para mejorar su negocio. Por ello se compromete en pagar sus cuotas oportunamente. Con el crédito que solicita, mandará pintar su estante que esta oxidado, así mismo comprar más materiales para implementar su librería.
texts.en: Rosa is 55 and lives with her husband in her own home. She has 3 children, who are already grown and have their own families. Rosa has a book store in her home. There she sells all sorts of stationery such as: cards, laimnates, and papers, and she also sells disposable containers. This is how she generates additional income, as she works elsewhere as a maid. Thus, when she finishes her work as a maid, she hurries home to attend to her business. Her customers know and recognize her good service, and sometimes they wait for her and even make their purchases the next day. With her earnings and your support she will restore the walls of her house. She is very happy to be able to remodel her home. In the future she wants to expand her business with the sales of beer and pop. This is her ninth loan with MFP, and she knows that it will be very useful for improving her business. Thus, she promises to repay her quotas on time. With the loan that she is requesting, she will have her shelves painted, as they are rusty. She will also buy materials to stock her business.

loans.use: to purchase products for her book store

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teofila; ella tiene 67 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en la municipalidad de Santiago, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere tener una tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo uso personal y para mantenimiento de su casa.            
                                           
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Teofila is a member of the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Teofila is 67 years old, married and has 4 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her work for the City of Santiago.  She works from 7.00am to 5.00pm.  Teofila would like to own a grocery store.  She is requesting this loan for personal use and to maintain her home.

Teofila is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: For personal use and to maintain her home

loans.name: Juntos Unidos Iremos Al Camino Del Exito Group

texts.es: Rosa, es la presidenta del grupo “Juntos Unidos Iremos al Camino del Éxito” el grupo está conformado por 13 miembros que a su vez son amigos y vecinos que tiene como objetivo alcanzar metas en conjunto. Entre ellos  está la presidenta Rosa D. 41 años D. edad casada y madre D. tres hijos D. los cuales uno a un está a su cuidado por ser menor D. edad. Rosa es dueña D. un locutorio y cabinas D. internet por lo cual este es su único medio D. ingresos económicos, cuenta con este negocio hace más D. tres años, el cual le ha dado una economía estable en su hogar. Con el reciente préstamo piensa invertirlo en la compra D. mercadería como, tarjetas D. recargas virtuales para teléfonos celulares. En el futuro le gustaría abrir un restaurant y continuar con el negocio D. locutorio. Así como Rosa cada integrante del grupo, tiene una meta en particular, que es el éxito y la mejoría económica para ellos y sus familias.
texts.en:
Rosa is the president of the "Juntos Unidos Iremos al Camino del Éxito" (Together United We Will Follow the Road to Success) group.  This group has 13 members who are friends and neighbors.  Their purpose is to achieve goals together.

The group's president is 41 year-old Rosa who is married and has three children.  Only one of her children is still a minor and in her care.  Rosa owns an establishment which contains telephone booths for public use and also Internet terminals.  This is her only source of income.  She has had this business for more than three years and it has provided her household with financial stability.

Rosa is planning to invest her loan in buying merchandise such as virtual prepaid cards for cell phones.  In the future, she would like to open a restaurant and continue with her telephone business.

Just like Rosa, the other members of the group each have their own private goal which is success and financial improvement for themselves and their families.

loans.use: To buy virtual prepaid cards for cell phones

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: El. Sr. Mauricio García desea comprar un videojuego para unas maquinitas que tiene en su tienda ya que argumenta el Sr. Mauricio que abra mas flujo de niños en su tienda por lo cual aumentaran sus ventas y desea poder comprarlo con el crédito pues ve en el crédito la mejor manera de llevar acabo su proyecto pues considera que el interés es muy bajo ya que no tendría que desembolsar todo de golpe y no seria un gasto muy fuerte para su economía. .
texts.en:
Mauricio García would like to buy a video game for some games machines that he has in his store since he says that this will increase the flow of children to his store which means that his sales will increase.

Mauricio would like to make his purchase with this loan because he sees the loan as the best way of carrying out his project.  He considers the interest on the loan to be very low and because it means that he won't have to pay a large sum up front this, in turn, means that it won't be a very big out-of-pocket expense which would hurt his finances.

loans.use: To buy a video game for his game machine

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es: Dina, de 25 años de edad, convive con Víctor  de 30 años y tienen dos hijas, Mayra de 05 años y Abel de 02 años de edad. Juntos viven en su propia casa en el distrito de Quimbiri. Dina, es  una mujer muy luchadora con ganas de sobre salir  y triunfar en la vida,  su actividad  rutinaria es apoyar a su pareja en la elaboración de  ladrillos de construcción. En el mundo de la ladrillerilla viene trabajando como 06 años; su almacén se encuentra en el populoso distrito de Quimbiri, también cuenta  con el apoyo de sus trabajadores quienes se encargan del proceso y reparto a domicilios. Existe mucha demanda en su negocio, atiende pedidos y abastece a diferentes distritos de la zona del Valle Río Apurimac como son: Pichari, San Francisco. Tiene proyectado comprar un carro de carga  para poder trasladar  su mercadería  y así reducir gastos en el alquiler del transporte. Este es su quinto crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir pagando de manera puntual, además se siente satisfecho con su banco comunal, por los beneficios que permite. Con el monto solicitado le servirá para el pago de sus jornaleros e invertir en adquirir materia prima para la elaboración de ladrillos.
texts.en:
Dina is 25 years old.  She lives with her partner, 30 year-old Víctor, and they have two daughters: 5 year-old Mayra and 2 year-old Abel.  They live in their own home in Quimbiri district.

Dina is a very hard-working woman who has the desire to get ahead and be successful in life.  Her business activity is supporting her partner in making bricks.  She has been working in the brick-making industry for 6 years.  Her store is located in the densely-populated district of Quimbiri.  Dina also has the support of her workers who take care of making the bricks and delivering them to people's homes.  There is a lot of demand in Dina's business.  She fills orders and supplies different districts of Valle Río Apurimac such as Pichari and San Francisco.

Dina is planning to buy a new hand truck to help her move her merchandise and thereby reduce costs in hiring transportation.  This is her fifth loan with MFP and she pledges to continue making her repayments on time.  She feels happy with her community bank because of the benefits it gives her.  She will use the loan money to pay her day laborers and to invest in acquiring raw material for making bricks.

loans.use: To buy material for making bricks and to hire workers to help her in her work

loans.name: Maida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maida; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia tiene un taller de artesanía donde hace diferentes trabajos como mantas, collares, pulseras y trabajos en arcilla, por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artesanía al por mayor.                           
                          
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maida is a member of the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Maida is 38 years old, single and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling handicrafts.  She has a craft workshop where she makes different items such as blankets, necklaces, bracelets and pottery.  Through her business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Maida would like to expand and improve her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy handicrafts wholesale.

Maida is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy handicrafts wholesale

loans.name: La Reforma 3 Group

texts.en:
Catalina is the coordinator of her group named La Reforma 3 (Reform). She has a long term partner and is a mother with 7 children, all living with her in a simple structure home, in a rural villa of San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries. The main economic activity here is the free trading zone, a cement factory, and other businesses. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity. 

Catalina has been operating clothing sales for aproximately 10 years. She saved a small amount of capital and started her business. She plans to use this loan to buy jeans, shirts, underwear and other clothing pieces for both men and women. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business, like her other eight loans. She wants to have a successful business with employees. This is currently her most difficult challenge and her goal. By making her business more successful, she will have the opportunity to have a better life and to help others.

In the meantime, she plans to continue enjoying to read and watch television. Her story is generally representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti.

loans.use: To buy clothing.

loans.name: Anita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Anita; ella tiene 47 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de ama de casa, la socia hace diferentes tipos pequeños de negocio como venta de adornos de navidad en forma independiente, la socia quiere tener una tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de su casa.             
                                      
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Anita is a member of the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Anita is 47 years old.  She lives with her partner and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her work as a housewife.  She pursues a number of small business activities such as selling Christmas decorations independently.  She would like to own a grocery store.  She is requesting this loan to maintain her home.

Anita is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To maintain her home

loans.name: Erika

texts.es:
