La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHIKON”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Erika; ella tiene 29 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia es ama de casa se dedica al cuidado de sus hijos y de su casa siendo esta la única actividad que realiza por el momento pero ella espera poder buscar  un buen trabajo más adelante y así poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.   

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su familia.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Erika is a member of the "CHIKON” community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Erika is 29 years old.  She lives with her partner and has two children.  Erika is a housewife who looks after her children and her home.  This is the only activity that she carries out at the moment but she hopes to be able to look for a good job in the future and thereby provide her family with a better quality of life.

Erika is requesting this loan to buy essentials for her family.  She is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy essentials for her family

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
L. señora María, tiene 59 años D. edad, es viuda hace 08 años y tiene 01 hija llamada Jhosy Mayra D. 22 años. Juntos residen en  una casa alquilada en el distrito D. Quimbiri, que pertenece al departamento convención Cusco Perú. María, es una señora emprendedora, que trata D. sobre salir adelante con los pequeños negocios que tiene. Sus ingresos económicos lo genera su pequeña bodega y su fuente D. soda.
Maria cuenta con detalle como se inicio en el negocio, menciona que sufrió por el fallecimiento D. su pareja porque era su felicidad y el sostén D. su familia. Con el transcurso del tiempo Trató D. superarse y seguir adelante, con los ahorros que tenía aperturò una tienda D. abarrotes, que le genera buenas ganancias y gracias a ello  pudo abrir  una fuente D. soda. Hoy trabaja con el  apoyo D. su hija y juntas tratan D. superarse, en el futuro  ansía ampliar su negocio y comprarse un lote D. terreno donD.  puedan vivir con tranquilidad y no estar pendiente en las fechas D. pago del alquiler D.  cuarto. Este es su noveno crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con sus concernientes pagos, además esta satisfecha con su banco comunal y es una socia  muy querida. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará lo necesario para implementar su tienda.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old.  She has been a widow for 8 years and has one daughter called Jhosy Mayra who is 22 years old.  She lives together with her daughter in a rented house in Quimbiri district, in Convención department, Cusco, Peru.

María is an enterprising lady who tries to get ahead through her small businesses.  She makes her income through a small grocery store and soda fountain.  Maria tells us in detail how she started her business.  She mentions that she suffered a lot when her partner died because he was the joy and support of their family.  Over time, she tried to improve herself and get ahead.  She used her savings to open a grocery store which makes good profits and, thanks to these profits, she was able to open a soda fountain.  She currently works with her daughter's help and they both try to improve themselves together.

In the future, Maria would like to expand her business and buy a plot of land where they can live peacefully and not constantly be waiting for the dates when they have to pay the rent on their room.

This is Maria's ninth loan with MFP and she pledges to continue making her repayments on time.  She is very satisfied with her community bank and she is a very well-liked member.  She will use her loan to buy what she needs to stock her store.

loans.use: To buy products to stock her store

loans.name: Mary

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Mary; ella tiene 20 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de tienda de abarrotes, la socia también estudia la carrera profesional de derecho, la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta 3:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos y harinas para la tienda de abarrotes.         
                                         
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mary belongs to the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Mary is 20 years old, single and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store business.  Mary is also studying for a degree in law.  She works from 5.00am to 3.00pm and would like to expand her grocery store.  She is requesting this loan to buy essentials such as rice, noodles and flour for her store.

Mary is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy essentials such as rice, sugar, noodles and flour, to stock her grocery store

loans.name: Carlos Genaro

texts.es:
El Senor Carlos S., tiene 33 anos de edad, es casado, tiene 3 hijos, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace mas de 20 anos, originario de la comarca Namanji en Esteli.
Dede los 10 anos de edad, ayudaba a sus padres en las actividades agricolas, estudiaba en una humilde escuelita, cerca de su comunidad, llamado Los Morguetas, estudiaba solamente por 4 horas al dia. No pudo seguir con sus estudios para dedicarse completamente ayudar a sus padres, pues no teniana los suficientes recursos.
A los 16 anos su Papa le regalo 1/2 manzana del terreno para que se ayudara con sus gastos, pues ya se habia casado, y empezo a trabajar en sociedad con un amigo, y asi estubo por al rededor de 4 anos, pero durante ese tiempo ahorro dinero y compro mas terreno y sembrando.
Luego invirtio en la compra de un Pozo y otros materiales agricolas, para mejorar su produccion. Apoya a sus hijos para que estudien y se preparen, y en vacacione ellos le ayudan con las actividades del negocio, pero el desea que mejor ellos se preparen  salgana adelante.
Realizo el credito para la compra de insumos agricolas, para la siembra de Cebolla y Chiltoma.
Su Meta es tener su casa y brindarle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos S. is 33 years old, married and has 3 children.  He has been farming for more than 20 years and is originally from Namanji region in Esteli. 

Carlos started helping his parents with their farming at the age of 10.  He studied in a humble, small school near his community called Los Morguetas.  He only studied for 4 hours a day.  He couldn't continue with his studies because he had to help his parents full time as they didn't have enough financial resources.

At the age of 16, Carlos' dad gave him 50 square meters of land so that he could help him with his expenses as he had gotten married.  He started to work with a friend and he worked that way for around 4 years.  However, during this time he saved money and bought more land on which he grew crops.

Later, Carlos invested in buying a well and other farming materials to improve his production.  He supports his children in their studies and during their school vacations they help him with his work.  However, he believes it is more important that they prepare themselves professionally and get ahead in life.

Carlos is requesting his loan to buy farming supplies for his onion and sweet pepper crops.  His goal is to own his own home and to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To grow vegetables

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Betty; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de peluches, ella vende en forma ambulatoria y también trabaja en un hostal, la socia lleva a las diferentes tiendas para hacer los peluches, la socia quiere tener una tienda para vender los peluches. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar peluches al por mayor.  
                                               
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Betty is a member of the “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Betty is 28 years old.  She lives with her partner and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling cuddly toys.  She makes her sales as an itinerant street vendor.  She also works in a hostel.  Betty takes her products to different stores.  She would like to own a store where she could sell her cuddly toys.  She is requesting this loan to buy more cuddly toys wholesale.

Betty is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy cuddly toys wholesale

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CHIKON”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Victoria; ella tiene 46 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de menestras como lentejas, frejoles entre otros, la socia luego lo distribuye a sus clientes de forma ambulatoria y personas que también le solicitan a la vez también tiene su negocio de tienda de abarrotes donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche siendo esta la forma de sacar a su familia adelante.  

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos para sus negocios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: The member belongs to the Chikon Community Bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, belonging to the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco. The member is Mrs. Victoria. She is 46, married and has 3 children. She buys and sells mixed vegetables such as lentils and beans, among others. She later distributes to her customers on foot. She also has a grocery store business where she sells basic staples such as rice, sugar and milk. This is how she gets her family ahead. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of products for her businesses. She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of her quotas.

loans.use: She is requesting this loan for the purchase of products for her businesses.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “ÑAUPASUNCHIS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Pablo; el tiene 50 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de taller de zapatería, el vende diferentes tipos de zapatos y los lleva a las diferentes tiendas, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el taller de zapatería. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los zapatos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member belongs to the  “ÑAUPASUNCHIS” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco. The member is Mr. Pablo. he is 50, lives with his partner, and has two children. He alternates his daily activities with his shoe workshop. He sells different types of shoes and brings them to the different stores. He wants to expand and improve his shoe workshop. He is requesting this loan to purchase materials to make shoes. He is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of his quotas.

loans.use: the member is requesting this loan for the purchase of materials for making shoes.

loans.name: La Reforma 4 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Urcania is one of the members of the <i>La Reforma 4 & 5<i> (Reform) group. They are micro-entrepreneurs dedicated to selling clothing, natural goods, shoes, education services, etc., in the city of San Pedro de Macoris, which is famous for its athletes and its sugar industry. At present, its economy depends on the duty-free industrial zones, the cement industry and other minor activities like tourism. 

Urcania is the mother of two children and, together with her long-term partner, she has been able to provide the necessities for her family.

Urcania is receiving her seventh loan. For each loan, she has made her payments on time and has made good investments. She is planning to invest her new loan to purchase goods for her cafeteria, where she sell sandwiches, burgers, juices and other different foods and snacks. She is going to use her earnings to buy furniture for her living room and to save, because her plan in the short-term is to have a house and a bigger cafeteria. She will be able to do this by saving and continuing to invest in her business. With Esperanza's loans, she will be able to improve her family and her own life.

loans.use: Sugar, fruits, bread, jam, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith, de 38 años, vive en su casa que es propia al lado de sus 2 hijos, de los cuales uno es mayor y solo se hace cargo del menor; juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Desde hace 7 años, esta empeñosa mujer se dedica a la venta de ropa, mediante pedidos, de manera ambulatoria deja las prendas de vestir a sus clientes que le pagan a crédito. Dice que esta muy satisfecha con su trabajo pues obtiene regulares ganancias que le han permitido sacar adelante a sus hijos sola. Ella  misma se califica como una mil oficios, que le gusta trabajar en diversas actividades relacionadas al comercio, pues siempre esta en la búsqueda de generarse buenos ingresos, es por esta razón que por temporadas vende dulces, y diversos artículos, que ella observa que tendrán acogida. Su labor es tranquila pues la desempeña durante todas mañanas y tardes; y le deja tiempo para el quehacer del hogar; además como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un negocio de venta de bijuoteria en algún mercado de la zona. Es el décimo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Judih tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en el pago de la primera letra del alquiler de lo que será su local del negocio que desea emprender, de esta manera quiere seguir adelante.
texts.en: Judith, age 38, lives in her own home with her two children, of whom one is grown and thus only one is under her care. Together, they work every day to get ahead. For seven years, this enterprising woman has sold clothing through orders, on foot. She brings the clothing to her customers who pay on credit. She says that she is very satisfied with her work as she obtains a regular income that has allowed her to get her children ahead on her own. She describes herself as a jack of all trades, as she enjoys working in diverse activities related to business, and she is always looking to make a good income. Thus, in certain seasons she sells sweets and diverse items that she has observed to be in demand. Her work is peaceful, and she does it in the mornings and afternoons; this gives her time to do the housework. Furthermore, as she is an enterprising woman, in the future she plans to open a jewelry store in a market in the area. This is her tenth loan with MFP, and she promises to pay her quotas punctually as she does not want to disappoint those who have made this loan possible. This loan will allow her to continue to work in the search of progress. Judith plans to invest this loan in the payment of the first rent installment for the location that will be the business that she wants to open. This way, she wants to continue progressing.

loans.use: to rent a space to start a more stable business

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CHIKON”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Javier; el tiene 22 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio se dedica al negocio de transporte turístico el socio trabaja con turismo hace ya unos años atrás y  trabaja con diferentes agencias que  solicitan su servicios de los diferentes tours que brinda, de esta forma el socio saca a su familia adelante.  

El socio solicita el préstamo para la mantención de su carro y para algunos gastos personales. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, "CHIKON."  It is located in the district of Urubamba, which belongs to the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.

The member's name is Javier.  He is 22, has a live-in girlfriend, and has 1 son.  He is in the business of tourism transportation and has worked in tourism for several years.  He works with various agencies that request the services of different tours he offers.  In this way, he takes good care of his family.

He is requesting a loan to do maintenance on his car and to pay for some personal expenses.  He is happy about the loan and promises to make all of his payments on time.

loans.use: This member is requesting a loan to do maintenance on his car and to pay for some personal expenses.

loans.name: Flor Del Carmen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MINKA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Huanchac en la provincia y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Flor D. Maria; La socia tiene 65 años D. edad, la socia es casado y tiene 4 hijos, la socia tiene un pequeño hospedaje ella requiere el préstamo para invertir en su pequeño hospedaje y poder comprar algunas cosas como productos D. limpieza, sábanas nuevas entre otras. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. productos D. limpieza para su hospedaje.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, "Minka."  It is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.

The member's name is Flor D. Maria.  She is 65, is married, and has 4 children.  She provides lodging, and she needs a loan to invest in this business so she can buy cleaning products, new sheets, etc.

She is happy about the loan she is being offered, and she promises to make all of her payments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: This member is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of cleaning products for the lodging she provides.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy, de 43 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de su esposo Luis Alberto de 48 años y sus 2 hijos, de los cuales se hace cargo del menor, pues el mayor trabaja y es independiente. Desde hace 5 años, esta empeñosa mujer se dedica a la confección en pedrería en diversas prendas de vestir, y le gusta mucho su labor pues la desempeña por horas en un taller donde una amiga le proporciona a ella junto con otras cuatro señoras para que borden a través de un intermediario. Esta muy satisfecha porque obtiene regulares ganancias que le han permitido sacar a sus hijos adelante, y le gusta bastante pues lo desempeña por tiempos y no descuida los quehaceres de su hogar. Generalmente trabaja durante cuatro días a la semana durante las mañanas y le entretiene bastante; además como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado trabajar en el mismo rubro, pero sin intermediarios, de esta manera espera salir adelante. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Nancy tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de varios rollos de tela que necesita, pues tiene un pedido pendiente para cumplir y también quiere empezar a independizarse, de esta manera espera seguir adelante.
texts.en: Nancy, age 43, lives in her own home with her husband Luis Alberto, age 48, and their 2 children. She cares for her younger child, and the older child works and is independent. For 5 years this enterprising woman has made beaded clothing. She likes her job a lot, and works for hours with four other women in a workshop owned by a friend. They work for an intermediary. She is very satisfied because she makes a regular income that has allowed her to get her children ahead. She likes her work a lot and she works but does not have to forget about her housework. She generally works four days a week in the mornings, and she has a lot of fun. Since she is an enterprising woman, in the future she plans to work in the same field but without intermediaries; this way, she hopes to get ahead. This is her third loan with MFP and she promises to pay her quotas punctually, as she does not want to disappoint those who have made this loan possible. This loan will allow her to continue working in the search of progress. Nancy plans to invest the requested loan in the purchase of various rolls of fabric that she needs. She has a pending order to fill and also wants to start becoming independent. This way, she hopes to continue getting ahead.

loans.use: to purchase various rolls of fabric

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia, de 36 años, vive al lado de su esposo Climancio de 34 años y de sus cuatro hijos, de los cuales solo se hace cargo de los tres menores, pues el mayor trabaja; juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Esta trabajadora madre de familia se dedica a la fabricación de todo tipo de polos, tanto para hombres como para mujeres, en el taller que esta ubicado en una pieza de su vivienda. En este lugar trabaja al lado de su esposo, su hijo mayor y un ayudante; entre ellos producen gran cantidad de polos que venden al por mayor a los grandes emporios de la ciudad. Esta muy satisfecha pues obtiene regulares ganancias del negocio familiar, aunque para lograr el éxito deba trabajar todos los días de la semana durante todo el día; pero le gusta mucho su labor pues es tranquila y no descuida los quehaceres del hogar y sobretodo la educación de sus hijos. Como es una dama muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado, junto a su esposo, ampliar el negocio de producción de prendas; y quiere empezar a confeccionar mayor variedad de prendas, pues tiene cantidad de clientes que le hacen grandes pedidos. Es el quinto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Sonia tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de varios rollos de tela que necesita para continuar produciendo las prendas de vestir que comercializa, de esta manera espera alcanzar el progreso.
texts.en: Sonia, age 36, lives with her husband Climancio, age 34, and their four children, of whom they only care for the three youngest, as the oldest works. They work together every day to get ahead. This hard-working mother makes all types of polos, for men and women, in a workshop in her home. She works with her husband, her oldest child and a helper. Together they produce a large quantity of polos which they sell wholesale to the large department stores of the city. She is very satisfied, as she makes a regular income from the family business, even though she has to work all day, every day to have success. However, she really enjoys her work as it is very peaceful and she does not have to forget about her housework, and above all the education of her children. As she is a very enterprising woman, in the future she and her husband plan to expand their clothing production business. She wants to start making a larger variety of articles, and she has customers who are making large orders. This is her fifth loan with MFP, and she promises to pay her quotas punctually as she does not want to disappoint those who have made this loan possible. It will allow her to continue working in search of success. Sonia plans to invest the requested loan in the purchase of various rolls of fabric that she needs in order to continue producing the clothing articles that she sells. This way, she hopes to progress.

loans.use: to purchase rolls of fabric

loans.name: Yajayra

texts.es: Yajayra, de 27 años, vive en una casa alquilada en compañía de su esposo Enrique de 36 años y de su pequeño hijo menor de edad; juntos buscan que alcanzar el progreso. Desde hace 4 años esta trabajadora madre de familia se dedica al bordado de pedrería en diversas prendas de vestir, realiza esta labor en el taller de una amiga que trae grandes volúmenes de ropa para que ella junto a otras 3 señoras realicen el cuidadoso trabajo. Yajaira esta muy contenta, pues solo trabaja durante 4 días a la semana, por horas y cuando debe salir se lleva el trabajo a casa, de esta manera no descuida las labores del hogar y si lo considera rentable pues ayuda a su esposo en los gastos del hogar. Como es muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un negocio de venta de comestibles en su casa, pero sabe que lo logrará con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permite continuar adelante. Yajaira tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de 2 rollos de tela y también quiere terminar el tarrajeado de una pieza de su casa.
texts.en: Yajayra, age 27, lives in a rented home with her husband Enrique, age 36, and their young child. Together, they are looking to succeed. For four years this hard-working mother has done beaded embroidery on diverse articles of clothing. She does this work in the workshop of a friend who brings large volumes of clothing for Yajayra and three other woman to do this delicate work. Yajaira is very happy, as she only works 4 days a week, and when she needs to leave she brings her work home. This way, she does not have to forget about her housework. This is profitable work and she is able to help her husband with the household expenses. Since she is a very enterprising person, in the future she plans to open a food sales business in her home, and she knows she will only achieve it with hard work and dedication. This is her third loan with MFP, and she promises to pay her quotas punctually, as she does not want to disappoint those who will make this loan possible. This loan will allow her to continue moving ahead. Yajaira plans to invest the requested loan in the purchase of two rolls of fabric, and she also wants to finish plastering part of her home.

loans.use: to purchase two rolls of fabric, and have part of her home plastered

loans.name: La Cima Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama L. CIMA, se encuentra ubicado en L. comunidad D. Lerma en el Estado D. México, está integrado por 11 clientas, en él se encuentra L. señora AMANDA R. D. 32años D. edad, nos platica que estudió una carrera técnica, tienen 2 hijos D. 7 y 4 años D. edad, elL. tiene 8 años D. casada y desD. ese entonces se ha dedicado a L. venta D. cosméticos, ropa y zapatos por catálogo, con los ingresos que obtiene D. esta actividad ha apoyado a su familia, quiere el crédito para L. compra D. cosméticos mismos que venD. entre sus familiares y amigas, L. ilusión que siempre ha tenido Amanda es que sus pequeños hijos puedan tener acceso a una mejor educación.Observaciones:Maria D. Lourdes A. salió muy atras en L. foto, y L. clienta a L. que le da L. luz en L. mejilL. se llama Amanda R..
texts.en:
This group is called, "L. Cima," and is located in the community of Lerma in the state of México.  It is comprised of 11 members, including Amanda R..  She is 32 and told us that she doesn't have higher education.  She has 2 children who are 7 and 4.  She has been married for 8 years, and since then, she has sold cosmetics, clothing, and shoes by catalog.  With the income she makes, she supports her family.  She wants this loan to purchase cosmetics, which she sells among her friends and family.  Amanda has always had the dream of giving her children access to a better education.

Observations:  Maria D. Lourdes A. is very far back in the picture.  The member with the light on her cheek is Amanda R..

loans.use: To invest in their businesses.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz, de 30 años, convive con Aquiles, de 29 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Lucila, de 12 y Talía, de 6 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay.  Está laboriosa mujer se dedica a la siembra de papa, alverja y maíz; asimismo cría animales como vacas, toros, de los cuales saca una buena cantidad de leche para la elaboración de queso, los cuales vende en la ciudad de Huasahuasi, obteniendo buenas ganancias. Ya tiene más de 20 años dedicándose a la agricultura y ganadería, los que después de cada cosecha los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de Huancayo. Paralelo a su trabajo, ella se dedica a cocinar los alimentos del día, a los peones que trabajan con el señor Jesús, quien es un gran agricultor. Ahora después de cosechar sus cultivos de papa, piensa sembrar alverja; sin descuidar a sus animales. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y como socia nueva de su banco comunal, siente gran respeto por todos los integrantes, que son personas comprometidas con el progreso de su asociación. De obtener el crédito invertirá en la compra de semillas de arveja, 20 sacos de abono orgánico, para sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en: Luz is 30- years-old and lives with her boyfriend, Aquiles, who is 29.  They have 2 children:  Lucila, who is 12; and Talía, who is 6.  They live in their own home, which is located in the town of Cumutay.  This hard-working woman makes a living by farming potatoes, peas, and corn.  She also raises animals like cows and bulls, and she gets a good quantity of milk from the cows to make cheese, which she sells in the city of Huasahuasi and makes good profits.  She has worked in agriculture and livestock for 20 years.  After each harvest, she sells her crops at the wholesale market in Huancayo.  Parallel with her job, she also cooks food during the day for the workers who work with señor Jesús, who is a great farmer.  Now after she harvests her potato crop, she plans to sow peas while still tending to her animals.  This is her fourth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma.  As a new member of the communal bank, she has a great respect for all of the members.  They are people dedicated to the progress of their assocation.  If she obtains this loan, she will invest in the purchase of pea seeds and 20 sacks of organic fertilizer for her potato crop.

loans.use: To buy pea seeds and 20 sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: La Fuente De Bendicion 7 Group

texts.en:
Hirza is one of the members of La fuente D. Bendicion 7 (The source of Blessing). They are micro-entrepreneurs dedicated to selling clothing, natural goods, shoes etc. in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area. Hirza is the mother of five children  living together with her long term partner, in a rural village outsiD. the town. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.


Hirza is receiving her 4th loan. For each loan, she has maD. her payments on time and has maD. good investments. She is planning to invest her new loan to purchase cloths and shoes for her business, which she started with the first loan she received from Esperanza, around 2 years ago. Hirza will use the profits to build a room on her house. She is  working  hard for her children's  future to give them all they need to study and succeed.

loans.use: To buy clothing

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros.

Her name is Luz Marina, and she is 35 years old.  Luz Marina has a common law husband and two children.  She is requesting the loan for her and her husband´s carpentry business.  They make furniture, doors, and tables (along with anything else you can think of out of wood) to order and sell them from their home in Cachimayo.  She has been a client of Arariwa for 10 years. 

Luz Marina commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in a carpentry business

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros.

Her name is Victoria, and she is 61 years old.  Victoria is a widow and has nine children (most of them out of university and working).  She is requesting the loan to invest in her food sale business.  She makes breakfast in her home and brings it to construction sites around Cusco to sell. Victoria commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in a food  business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy wood for making doors

loans.name: Potrerillo 3 Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa de Yeny Yuliana G. una integrante del grupo Potrerillo 3 que está ubicado en el Estado de Veracruz, en México. Se ve a las 9 integrantes del grupo en la foto. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa que inicio hace 3 años. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de ropa de temporada y asi sus ganancias aumentaran, al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente satisfecha. Tiene una hija, y espera obtener más ganancia para darle mejor vida a su hija.Luz del Rocio H., es la Tesorera del grupo, tiene bachillerato, es madre y tiene en total una hija. Ella se dedica a la venta de pollos rostizados que inicio hace 8 años. Solicita el prestamo para comprar mas insumos para su negocio ya que es la temporada que vende más.
texts.en: This photo was taken at the home of Yeny Yuliana G. a member of the Potrerillo 3 group which is located in Veracruz State, in México. You can see the 9 members of the group in the photo. She sells clothes which she started doing 3 years ago. She is requesting the loan to buy clothes that are in season so that her profits will increase, at the time of requesting the loan she is feeling satisfied. She has a daughter, and hopes to earn greater profits to give a better life to her daughter. Luz del Rocio H.,is the group's Treasurer, she has a high school diploma, is a mother and has one daughter. She sells roast chicken which she started doing 8 years ago. She is requested the loan to buy more goods for her business as it is the season where she sells the most.

loans.use: Invest in their business

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros.

Her name is Irene, and she is 43 years old.  Irene is married and has four children, the oldest of which is 23 years old.  She is requesting the loan to invest in her restaurant.  She runs a restaurant out of her home in Cachimayo and sells all types of food, beer, and soda.  Her favorite dish to make is chicken with rice. Irene commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To Invest in a restaurant

loans.name: Rene

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chincheros.

His name is Rene and he is 36 years old.  Rene is married and has two children.  He is requesting the loan to invest in his transportation business.  He is part of a cooperative and runs a bus from Cusco, Peru to Anta.  He will invest in both maintenance of the vehicle and gasoline to run the route.

Rene commits to making his payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in bus maintenance

loans.name: Gardenias De Sumidero Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa D. la señora Irma J., una integrante del grupo Gardenias D. Sumidero, que está ubicado en la comunidad D. Sumidero,en el Estado D. Veracruz, en México. Se ve al grupo D. señoras alrededor D. la ropa que venD. la señora Irma, en la foto. Ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa D. segunda mano, que inicio hace 24 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar mas ropa D. invierno y tener bien surtido su negocio en esta temporada. Sus compañeras y clientes la conocen como una persona responsable y trabajadora. Al momento D. solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta ya que es una buena temporada para la venta D. ropa D. invierno y año nuevo. Tiene 47 años, estudio hasta  la secundaria, es casada y tiene en total 3 hijas. Quiere este crédito para surtir su negocio D. ropa con mercancia D. temporada y poder mejorar sus ventas. también espera en un futuro no muy lejano poder construir afuera D. su casa un local para poner su negocio D. venta D. ropa pero nueva, no D. segunda como la que venD. ahora y con esto mejorar su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia.
texts.en: This photo was taken in Irma J.'s house. She is an indispensable member of the Gardenias D. Sumidero group, which is located in the community of Sumidero, in the State of Veracruz, Mexico. Irma can be seen in the photo among the group of women surrounded by the clothing which she sells. She sells second-hand clothing, and has done so for 24 years. She is requesting the loan in order to buy more winter clothing and to diversify her business for this season. Her fellow group members and her customers know her as a hard-working and responsible person. At the time of asking for this loan, she is very happy since it is a good season for the sale of winter and new year's clothes. She is 47 years old, attended school through the 9th graD., is married and has 3 daughters. She wants this loan so she can supplement her clothing business with seasonal merchandise and improve her sales. She also hopes, in the not too distant future, to be able to move her business out of her house to a new location, and to sell new clothing, not second-hand clothes like she sells now, thereby improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: Invest in her clothing business

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chincheros.

His name is Albert and he is 23 years old.  Albert has a common law wife and doesn´t have any children.   He is requesting the loan to invest in his taxi service.  He currently owns one taxi that he runs in Cusco and is requesting the loan to maintain his vehicle.  Since it is the rainy season, recently he has more business.

Albert commits to making his payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in a taxi service

loans.name: Raul Cesar

texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chincheros.

His name is Raul and he is 33 years old.  Raul is married and has one daughter who is seven years old.   He is requesting the loan to invest in his taxi service.  He currently owns one taxi that he runs in Cusco, and wants the loan to purchase another car.  His business has recently improved because it is the rainy season and more people in Cusco are taking taxis.

Raul commits to making his payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in Taxi Service

loans.name: Fuentes Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa de Graciela B., una integrante del grupo Fuentes, que está ubicado en el estado de Veracruz en ,México. Se ve en la foto a las 9 integrantes en el negocio. Graciela se dedica a la venta de abarrotes que inicio hace 3 años. Solicita el prestamo para surtir la tienda de abarrotes. Sus ganancias aumentarán notablemente.Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente satisfecha por haber obtenido el prestamo. Tiene 38 años, estudió una carrera técnica en enfermeria, es ama de casa y tiene un total de 3 hijos; 2 mujeres y 1 varón. Quiere este crédito para inversión en la tienda. Tambien espera obtener más ganancias para darle bienestar a sus hijos.
texts.en: This photo was taken in the home of Graciela B., a member of the Fuentes group, which is located in the state of Veracruz in Mexico. Nine of the members are in the photo, which was taken in her business. Graciela sells groceries, and started doing this three years ago. She is requesting this loan to stock the store with groceries. Her earnings will increase noticeably. She is satisfied to have obtained this loan. She is 38, and studied for a technical career in nursing. She is a housewife and has 3 children; two girls and one boy. She wants this loan in order to invest in her store. She also hopes to make more income in order to provide for her children's well-being.

loans.use: investments in the store.

loans.name: Calixtra De Jesus

texts.es: Calixtra de 65 años, tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar en Fundación León 2000, pues los financiamientos le han sido de mucha ayuda gracias a este tipo de apoyo ha logrado aumentar su negocio. Ella es una persona responsable que disfruta de este medio de vida, su familia está conformada por 4 personas quienes tiene que brindarles el alimento diario. La mayoría de sus clientes son vecinos, amigos y familiares atiende desde muy temprano desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche. El crédito es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, granos básicos y detergentes.
texts.en: Calixtra, age 65, has worked with Fundación León 2000 for a long time. The loans have been a great help to her, and thanks to this support she has been able to expand her business. She is a responsible person who benefits from this lifestyle. Her family is made up of four people for whom she has to provide daily. The majority of her customers are her neighbours, friends and family. She runs the store from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm. This loan is for the purchase of candies, drinks, bread, basic grains and detergents.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El Sr. Mario Vive en el municipio de el torno,  es nacido en el departamento de Potosí, capital minera de Bolivia, es de ocupación comerciante de papa, también en distintas épocas se dedica a la venta de animales como ser cerdos, vaca, gallinas, otros, lo cual le genera el ingreso para mantener a su familia, es separado tiene dos hijos los cuales están a su cargo, el destino del crédito es para la compra de papa, el cual es su actividad principal, tiene su puesto de venta en el mercado central el torno, es cliente antiguo, se siente agradecido por el apoyo y confianza que la institución le brindo.
texts.en:
Mario lives in the municipality of El Torno.  He was born in Potosí department, Bolivia’s mining capital.  He is a potato merchant and during certain seasons he sells farm animals like pigs, cows, chickens and others which generate income to support his family. He’s separated and has two children in his care.

He will use the loan to buy potatoes which is his main activity.  He has his sales stand in El Torno’s Central Market.  He is a longstanding client.  He feels grateful for the support and trust the institution has placed in him.

loans.use: To buy quintals of potatoes.

loans.name: Ely

texts.en:
This member belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros.

Her name is Ely and she is 38 years old.  Ely is single and has three children aged 4, 10, and 14 years old.  She is requesting the loan to invest in her business selling natural products in Cusco.  She is a street vendor who buys Chinese “Tianas”, vitamins, and natural antibiotics and sells them to tourists who come through Cusco.

She is very happy with the loan and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To Invest in Natural Products Business

loans.name: Carla

texts.es: La señora Carla tiene como principal actividad la costura de chalecos y chamarras, ella tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio, trabaja junto a su esposo, en los últimos años ella decidió incrementar sus ingresos incursionado en el negocio de la chocolatería. Doña Carla vende regalos y adornos que ella misma  elabora en especial en fechas como navidad, día de los enamorados y día de la madre. Con mucho esfuerzo lograron comprar su propia casa, donde actualmente viven ella, su esposo y sus hijos. El crédito lo solicito exclusivamente para el negocio de la chocolatería y para la elaboración de regalos y adornos realizados con cartón prensado, goma Eva, muñecos de peluche, chocolates y cintas de regalo, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Seaming vests and jackets is Señora Carla's main activity. She has a small workshop at home, where she works with her husband. In recent years she decided to increase her income by venturing into the chocolate business. Doña Carla sells gifts and ornaments that she makes herself, especially for Christmas, Valentine's Day and Mother's Day. With great effort they managed to buy their house, where they currently live: she, her husband and their children.

The loan she applies for will be used strictly for her chocolate business and for making gifts and ornaments from cardboard, glue, soft toys, chocolates and gift ribbons. Señora Carla is grateful to the microfinance institution for its support.

loans.use: To buy chocolates and material to make ornaments

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en: Rosa belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros. She is 38 years old, single and has three children. She is requesting the loan to invest in her clothing sales business. She buys and sells pants, jackets, shirts, and childrens clothes in “El Molino” — a part of Cusco. She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in clothing business

loans.name: Juana

texts.en: Juana belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros. She is 35 years old, single and has one child. She is requesting the loan to invest in the restaurant she runs out of her house in Cachimayo. Her favorite dish to prepare in her restaurant is chicken soup! She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in restaurant

loans.name: Judith Fabiola

texts.es: La Señora Judith vive en la zona de villa Armonía, ella vive en la casa de su esposo el no se encuentra en el país el se separo de doña Judith el año pasado  y se fue a radicar a la Argentina, pero les dejo la casa a sus dos pequeñas hijas de 8 y 9 años las cuales están a cargo de doña Judith ella trabaja vendiendo cosméticos (Productos de belleza, lociones, cremas, perfumes y otros); doña Judith se esfuerza mucho por lo que le dieron el puesto de líder de una prestigiosa empresa de Cosméticos, ahora ella se encarga de manejar grupos grandes,  desde hace un año y dos meses con esfuerzo sigue sacando adelante a sus dos pequeñas hijas, doña Judith además vende los productos en la feria 16 de julio, ella quiere el crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería  para estas fechas de fin de año, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Judith lives in Villa Armonía neighborhood in her husband's house.  Her husband isn't in the country.  He separated from Judith last year and went to settle in Argentina.  However, he left the house to their two young daughters aged 8 and 9 who are in Judith's care.

Judith's business is selling cosmetics (beauty products, lotions, creams, perfume, etc.)  She works hard and, because of her hard work, she was awarded a team leader position in a prestigious cosmetics company.  She is now in charge of managing large groups.  She has been doing this for one year and two months.  Through a lot of hard work she continues to get her two young daughters ahead in life.  Judith also sells products in the '16 de Julio' market.  She would like this loan to buy more merchandise for this end-of-year season.  She is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered her.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics for the end-of-year season

loans.name: Maudiel Marina

texts.es: Maudiel Marina tiene 26 años y un hijo a su cargo. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos para su negocio.  Hace más de 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad económica como es la venta de carne, por lo que sus inicios se dan por la necesidad de proporcionar a su familia el alimento diario, pues no tenía mucho apoyo de sus familiares. A pesar de las situaciones que enfrento ella ha salido adelante  con su actividad. Este financiamiento es para la compra de una gran variedad de carnes debido a esta época festiva que son muy solicitados por sus clientes.
texts.en: Maudiel Marina is 26 years old and has one child in her care.  This is not the first time that she has taken out loans for her business.  She has been in her business, selling meat, for more than 8 years.  She started her business because she needed to put food on the table for her family as she didn't have much support from her family members.  In spite of the difficulties that she faced, she has managed to get ahead in her business.  This loan will be used to buy a large variety of meat since she has a lot of demand from her customers during the festive season.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mariza

texts.en: Mariza belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros. She is 24 years old and has a common-law husband and one child. She is requesting the loan to invest in a restaurant. She is planning on opening a Cevichería in Cachimayo within the next couple of months and needs the loan to pay the deposit to rent a small space, to buy kitchen supplies and tables. She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in restaurant

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a (natural) gas system and tires

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en: Maribel belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros. She is 33 years old and has a common-law husband and two children. She is requesting the loan to send her sister to Lima to buy more inventory of shoes and underwear, which Maribel will sell wholesale to other vendors. She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in wholesale clothing business

loans.name: Tania Alejandra

texts.es: Tania Alejandra tiene 32 años, pues su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general.  Ella es bien emprendedora y disfruta de tener este medio de vida para mantener a su hijo menor de edad. La mayoría de sus clientes siempre le están solicitando diferentes productos que son necesarios para su negocio, ella es una mujer muy responsable y disfruta mucho de interactuar con sus clientes. En la actualidad continua con este negocio. Este crédito es para la compra de productos como calzado, cosméticos, ropa, sabanas entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Tania Alejandra is 32 years old.  Her business activity is selling general merchandise.  She is a very enterprising lady and she enjoys this way of supporting her child who is still a minor.  Her customers are always asking her for different products that are necessary for her business.  She is a very responsible woman and she very much enjoys interacting with her customers.  She is currently continuing with this business.  This loan will be used to buy products such as footwear, cosmetics, clothes, sheets, etc.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.en: Bernardina belongs to the “Solidaridad Cachimayo” cooperative bank, which is located in the Cachimayo district of the province of Chinceros. She is 54 years old and married with six children — three girls and three boys. She is requesting the loan to invest in her food sale business. She sells "salchipapa" (a mixture of French fries and hotdogs covered in mustard, ketchup, and mayo) and other food items in the street in Cachimayo from 4pm to 9pm. She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: Invest in food sale business

loans.name: Juana Magdalena

texts.es: La Sra. Juana  vive actualmente en el Barrio 18 de Noviembre de la Ciudad de Santa cruz de la Sierra. La Sra. Juana tiene dos Hijos (1 hombre y 1 mujer) ella es madre y padre para su hijos, hace mucho tiempo se separo de su esposo, fue un golpe para ella pero día a día fue luchando para sacar adelante a sus dos hijos, actualmente ella vende sus productos de belleza (pinturas, perfumes, cremas para rostros, cuerpo y Bisutería en general) donde ahora tiene su propia clientela y le va muy bien , el dinero solicitado será para aumentar su capital comprando mas Productos de Belleza y ropas para niños y joven a pedido de su clientela por la época de navidad, ya que tiene mucha demanda, y la Sra. manifestó  "agradezco a la institución por haber confiado en mi persona.
texts.en:
Juana currently lives in '18 de Noviembre' neighborhood, in the city of Santa Cruz de la Sierra.  Juana has two children (one boy and one girl).  She is both mother and father to her children as she separated from her husband a long time ago.  It was a blow for her but she worked hard every day to get her children ahead in life.

Juana currently sells beauty products (make-up, perfume, face creams, body creams and costume jewelry).  She has her own customers and things are going very well.  She will use the money she is requesting to increase her capital, buying more beauty products and clothes for children and young people to fill her customers' orders for the Christmas period as there is a lot of demand.  Juana says "I thank the institution for having placed their trust in me".

loans.use: To buy cosmetics for the end-of-year season

loans.name: Chasariz Marielo

texts.es: Chasariz Maria tiene 27 años, su actividad económica es una panadería. Hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio, inicio desde muy joven pues su familia era quien anteriormente se hacía cargo pero con el paso del tiempo le enseñaron este medio de vida, para que ella obtuviera su propio medio de ingreso. La mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan los encargos días antes, pues así ella tendrá tiempo de elaborar la variedad de pan que ofrece. El crédito es para la compra de harina, huevo, mantequilla, queso entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Chasariz Maria is 27 years old.  Her business is running a bakery.  She has had this business for more than 7 years.  She started in the business when she was very young.  Her family used to run the bakery but, over time, they taught her this way of life so that she could make her own income.  Most of her customers make orders with her days in advance which means that she has time to make the variety of bread that she offers.  She will use her loan to buy flour, eggs, butter, cheese, etc.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Fredy Antonio

texts.es: Freddy Antonio tiene 47 años. Desde hace 1 año vende nacatamales en su humilde vivienda. Prepara este tipo de alimento que es algo muy típico en Nicaragua. Con este negocio ha logrado salir adelante pues es una persona que lucha por sus intereses. Lo que le gusta de su negocio es que sus clientes se encuentran satisfechos y además se encuentra activo. El crédito que solicita es para comprar hojas, mecates, masa, cerdo entre otras cosas que son necesarias para la elaboración de estos productos.
texts.en: Freddy Antonio is 47 years old.  He has been selling 'nacatamales' (Nicaraguan tamales) for one year from his modest home.  He prepares this food which is very traditional in Nicaragua.  Through his loan he has managed to get ahead in life since he is a person who works hard for his own interests.  What he likes about his business is satisfying his customers and keeping active.  He will use the loan he is requesting to buy leaves, string, dough, pork, and other supplies that are necessary for making these products.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: G.s. Santiaga Group

texts.es: La señora Matilde Rosa tiene 40 años, es casada y tiene 1 hijo, a su cargo. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y plátanos.  Otra integrante de este grupo es Reyna tiene 34 años de edad, la señora obtiene ingresos de la venta de cosméticos, las cuales vende en el M.. La última integrante de este grupo es Dora Del Socorro, tiene 40 años es madre soltera  y tiene un hijo. Dora se dedica a una pulpería y venta de comida, pues además imparte clases como profesora es una persona muy emprendedora y juntas se han unido para realizar este crédito con el fin de invertir en sus negocios.
texts.en:
Matilde Rosa is 40 years old, married and has one child in her care.  Her business is selling fruit and bananas.

Another member of the group is 34 year-old Reyna who makes income from selling cosmetics in the market.

The last member of this group is Dora Del Socorro.  She is 40 years old and a single mother with one child.  Dora runs a small grocery store and sells meals.  She also gives classes as a teacher.  She is a very enterprising person.

These women have come together to request this loan which they will invest in their businesses.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Diego Alejandro

texts.es: El Sr. Diego se dedica a la costura y venta balones de futbol solicita el crédito para incrementar su capital de trabajo, ya que en estas fechas existe gran pedido de balones de futbol y necesita capital por este motivo solicito el crédito para poder comprar material para la costura de balones, se dedica a esta actividad hace seis   años durante el cual ya pudo acumular un buen capital, pero debido a que su padre enfermo tuvo que ayudar en los gastos médicos,  vive en domicilio de propiedad de sus abuelos, diego es soltero pero sus padres indican que es muy responsable y trabajador ya que ayuda con los gastos de la casa, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Diego sews and sells soccer balls. He seeks a loan to increase his working capital, because in this season there are large orders for soccer balls and he needs capital. Therefore he is seeking a loan to be able to buy material to sew the balls. He has been doing this for 6 years and has accumulated savings, but since his father became ill he had to help with the medical expenses. He lives in his grandparent’s home. Diego is single but his parents indicate that he is very responsible and hard-working as he helps with the household expenses. He is grateful to the institution for the support provided to him.

loans.use: Working capital to buy material to make soccer balls

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña María del Carmen, es comerciante de frutas y verduras, tiene 50 años de edad, vive con su esposo don Lucio, no tienen hijos a cargo ya que han formado sus propios hogares, el negocio doña María lo aprendió desde hace 30 años, ya que ayudaba a sus padres a atender el negocio, luego heredo el negocio y desde entonces está al frente de él, realiza sus ventas en el mercado municipal los días de comercio y los otros días lo hace de forma ambulante por las calles, ellos residen en Corinto departamento de Morazán.
Ella quiere invertir en el negocio comprando frutas y verduras para comercializar y solicita un préstamo para llevar a cabo la inversión, que le permitirá tener a disposición de los clientes variedad de verduras y frutas frescas.
Ella desea seguir contando con el apoyo de préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio y lograr estabilizarlo.
texts.en:
Doña María del Carmen sells fruits and vegetables. She is 50 years old and lives with her husband Lucio. They don't need to support their children, because these have formed their own families. Doña María acquired her business skills 30 years ago when she helped her parents in their business. Since that time she has been actively selling on market days at the municipal market and on the other days hawking through the streets. The family lives in Corinto in the department of Morazán.

Doña María wants to invest in her business by buying fruits and vegetables to sell. She applies for a loan to carry out the investment, which will enable her to offer a diversified choice of fresh fruits and vegetables to her customers.

In future she wants to continue with further loans to invest in her business and achieve financial stability.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Doña Alba, de 42 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas y pasteles, este negocio lo atienden todas las tarde en las afueras de su casa, primero venden los pasteles y luego se instalan a la venta de las pupusas.
Su dificultad es no poseer suficientes mesas y sillas para atender  a los clientes, por lo que solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en este activo que para el negocio es muy importante, este préstamo le dará la oportunidad de mantener el negocio en mejores condiciones, mejor vistosidad y atender mejor el flujo de clientes.
Su propósito es ir mejorando el negocio, aumentar la clientela y mejorar también la condición económica de su familia.
texts.en:
42 year old Alba lives in San Miguel, in San Miguel state. She lives with her husband and children. She sells pupusas (a traditional dish made of corn masa) and cakes. She works in her business every afternoon outside of her home, first selling cakes then later the pupusas.

Her challenge is not having enough tables and chairs for her customers, so she is asking for a loan to invest in this purchase as it is important for her business. This loan will give her the opportunity to maintain her business in improved conditions, better visual presentation, and improved customer experience flow.

Her goal is to keep improving the business, increase her customers, and improve her family’s economic situation.

loans.use: Buy tables and chairs for her business

loans.name: Helga Mary

texts.es: La Señora Helga casada tiene dos hijos, se dedica a la confeccion de prendas de vestir,  su esposo  la ayuda en la confección y entrega de las prendas terminadas, vive en alquiler no cuenta con una vivienda propia, la actividad que desarrolla le sirve para la manutención de ella y su familia, el trabajo que realiza es solo de costura pues no cuenta con capital propio para la materia prima la casa en la que vive es una construcción antigua y cuenta sólo con tres cuartos y  el patio es de tierra, su deseo es poder ahorrar para comprarse una casita y poder vivir cómodamente, con el dinero del crédito comprar telas para confeccionar prendas de vestir para un pedido que le hicieron, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Helga is married and has two children.  Her business is making clothes.  Her husband helps her in making the clothes and in delivering them.  She rents the house where she lives as she doesn't own her own home.  Her business helps her to support herself and her family.  The only work she does is sewing since she doesn't have her own capital for buying raw materials.

The house in which Helga lives is very old and only has three rooms and a dirt patio.  Her wish is to be able to save to buy herself a small house where she can live comfortably.

Helga will use her loan money to buy fabric so that she can make clothes for an order she has.  She is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered her.

loans.use: To buy fabric for making clothes

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: El señor Luis Manuel tiene 45 años, es casado y tiene tres hijos menores de edad a su cargo. El señor se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi, es una persona muy responsable  y padre de familia que se hace cargo de su familia. El ya tiene 10 años de  dedicarse a esta actividad, dio inicio con la pequeña moto y con ciertos ahorros logro obtener su propio medio de transporte siempre está ofreciendo el mejor servicio. El financiamiento es para la compra de repuesto para la moto.
texts.en: Luis Manuel is 45 years old, married, and has three minor children in his charge. He provides taxi services. He is a very responsible person and father to his family, and takes care of his family. He has been providing taxi service for 10 years, starting with a small bike and with savings he was able to obtain his own vehicle. He always offers the best service. The loan is to buy a part for the vehicle.

loans.use: Buy a part for his vehicle.

loans.name: Mayra Auxiliadora

texts.es: La señora Mayra Auxiliadora tiene 56 años, es madre soltera. La señora tiene un negocio de venta de ropa nueva. Ella sale todos los días  ya tiene 5 años de tener este negocio, el cual dio inicio cuando ella no tenía trabajo. La señora posee buena clientela sus ventas son al contado y al crédito. Ella está solicitando este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de mercadería, ya que se acercan buenas fechas. Su sueño siempre ha sido tener un negocio grande para tener las disponibilidades necesarias para su hogar.
texts.en:
Mayra Auxiliadora is 56 years old and a single mother.  She has a business selling new clothes.  She goes out every day to make sales and has been in this business for 5 years.  She started her business when she didn't have a job.

Mayra has a good customer base.  She makes some sales for cash and also offers goods on credit.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying merchandise since a good season is approaching.  Her dream has always been to have a big business so that she can have the assets she needs for her household.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Gloria, reside en Santiago de María departamento de Usulután, tiene casa propia y vive con sus hijas de 14 y 12 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa, tiene 49 años de edad, este negocio fue iniciativa propia, está situado en el mercado municipal desde hace 7 años, con un horario de 6:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de blusas, faldas, camisas sport, camisas de vestir y ropa interior, con la intención de fortalecer el negocio y brindar a los clientes diversidad de prendas de vestir e ir mejorando su vida cotidiana.
Sus aspiraciones es ser una microempresaria con un negocio fuerte, con mayores ganancias y mejorar el sistema de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Gloria lives in Santiago de María department of Usulután. She has her own home and lives with her two daughters, ages 14 and 12. She sells clothing. She is 49 years old. This business was one she started herself in the municipal market 7 years ago. She works from 6:00 AM until 4:00 PM.

She seeks a loan to buy blouses, skirts, t-shirts, dress shirts, and underwear, with the intention of strengthening her business and providing a variety of dress and casual clothing to her customers.

Her aspirations are to be a businesswoman with a strong business, with great profits, and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: Buy blouses, skirts, t-shirts, dress shirts, and underwear.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 37-year-old married man, living in Tayouneh with his wife and three children. Ali has worked as a middleman since 2004, with 15 years of experience dealing with apartments, land and real estate. Ali is requesting his second loan from Al Majmoua, in order to buy a car necessary for his work. Ali is known as an honest, smart and courageous man and is well known among most of his neighbors, clients and contractors. He is also an experienced electrician, still working in this field upon request. Ali hopes to open a brokerage office in the south of Lebanon, which would be a good investment for him.

loans.use: to buy a car necessary for his work

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es: Francisco José tiene 51 años, es un hombre casado y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Su actividad económica es brindar el servicio de transporte  la cual surge como una nueva fuente de ingreso para su familia. Este le ha permitido mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y brindarle ingresos a su familia por, lo que tiene una ruta destinada en donde sus diferentes clientes disfrutan de su servicio. Y es por esto que solicita a Fundación León 2000 un financiamiento de manera que le permita comprar llantas, repuestos y otras reparaciones necesarias. Los deseos de Francisco son aumentar sus ventas y mantener el núcleo familiar estable en todos los ámbitos.
texts.en:
Francisco José is 51 years old, married and has two dependent children in his care.  His business activity is providing transport services.  This is a new source of income for his family which has allowed him to improve his quality of life a little and provide income for his family.  He has a set route where his different customers enjoy his service.

Francisco José is requesting a loan from Fundación León 2000 so that he can buy tires, spare parts and make other necessary repairs to his vehicle.  Francisco's wishes are to increase his sales and to keep his family unit stable in every way.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Graciela Judith

texts.es:
Graciela de 33 años, ha trabajado con esfuerzo y dedicación durante años para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Viviendo en una zona  periurbana llamada Paraíso comenzó con la tienda para poder mantener a su familia y ayudarle a su esposo. 

En la actualidad su principal actividad económica es la tienda ya que desde su inicio tuvo que mudarse de zona para tener un mejor ingreso porque antes tenía mucha competencia. Vende azúcar, snack, arroz, bebidas etc. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 19h00pm todos los días. 

Quiere continuar con su negocio por eso quiere con el préstamo comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite y otros víveres para surtirla. En el futuro quiere surtir mas su tienda para tener más clientela.
texts.en:
Graciela is 33 years old. She has worked with effort and dedication for years to help her husband with the family expenses. Living in the suburban area called Paraíso, she began with the store in order to be able to support her family and help her husband.

Today her primary work is the store as since it opened she had to relocate in order to have better income because previously she had a lot of competition. She sells sugar, snacks, rice, beverages, etc. She works from 7:00 AM until 7:00 PM every day.

She wants to continue with her business therefore she wants a loan to buy rice, sugar, oil and other goods to stock the store. In the future she wants to stock more in her store in order to have more customers.

loans.use: Rice, sugar, oil

loans.name: Vilma Guadalupe

texts.es:
Vilma, tiene 35 años de edad, se dedica a vender tortillas, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, donde vive con su hija y su esposo, el negocio lo inicio con su madre, desde que tenía 10 años  de edad, hoy día su horario de trabajo es de 6:00am a 5:00pm, en el mercado municipal.
Vilma necesita de material para tener almacenado y solicita un préstamo para realizar dicha compra que será en maíz, leña y gas propano, con esta inversión mantendrá un buen nivel de materia prima existente para dar salida a la venta de tortillas y aumentar la producción.
Sus aspiraciones es tener un negocio estable, con muchos clientes, y generar para su familia ingresos.
texts.en:
Vilma is 35 years old and her business is selling tortillas.  She lives in Jucuapa, in Usulután department, with her husband and daughter.  She started her business with her mother when she was 10 years old.  Her current work day is from 6.00am to 5.00pm.  She works in the town market.

Vilma needs to have a supply of materials in stock and she is requesting a loan to buy corn, firewood and propane gas.  This investment will allow her to maintain a good level of raw materials on hand for her tortilla business and to increase her production.  Her goal is to have a stable business with a lot of customers and to make income for her family.

loans.use: To buy corn, firewood and propane gas

loans.name: Jose Abedon

texts.es: El señor José tiene dos hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos por lo que ha sido de gran ayuda. El brinda el servicio de  moto taxi, tiene 7 años de tener negocio, debido a que no tenía un medio de vida que le generara ingresos decidió buscar este medio de vida. Pues es una persona muy trabajadora y disfruta de conversar con sus clientes.
texts.en: José has two small children under his care. This is not the first time seeking a loan, and the loans have been a great help. He has provided taxi with his moto-taxi for 7 years; as he didn’t have work he decided to pursue this line of work. He is a hard-working person and enjoys chatting with his customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Rosa Idalia

texts.es:
Rosa, resiD. en Berlín departamento D. Usulután, vive con su esposo y aun no tienen hijos, se dedica a una tienda donD. ofrece artículos para el hogar, tiene 28 años D. edad.
Rosa inicio este negocio hace 2 años, por iniciativa propia, instalado en su casa D. habitación, ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería como frijoles, arroz, aceite, detergentes, arreglos florales, entre otros productos que ofrece en el negocio, con esta compra ella quiere disponer D. suficiente inventario para atender la demanda, además que tendrá la oportunidad D. poder vender más.
Su propósito es fortalecer el negocio, garantizar ingresos al hogar y aumentar la familia con su esposo contar en un futuro con hijos.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in the Berlín department of Usulután with her husband. She doesn’t have any children yet. She works in a store that sells items for the home. She is 28 years old.

Rosa began this business 2 years ago on her own initiative, opening the store in her home. She is seeking a loan to buy merchandise such as beans, rice, oil, detergent, floral arrangements and other products to sell in her business, and with this loan she wants to be able to have sufficient inventory to meet demand in addition, to have the opportunity to be able to sell even more.

Her goal is to strengthen her business, guarantee her household income, and with her husband grow their family by having children in the future.

loans.use: Buy merchandise such as beans, rice, oil, detergent and flower arrangements.

loans.name: Leonor Jaqueline

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Damas Positivas.

La señora Leonor lleva 4 ciclos  en el Banco comunal y le gusta por los beneficios adicionales que brinda la institución y por las facilidades para  realizar los pagos. Tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 13 y 9 años que  estudian en colegio y en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en un banco.

Se dedica a la venta productos Avon, (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas) y de ropa por catalogo, trabaja de lunes a viernes unas cuatro horas por dia, su forma de venta es bajo pedidos, ella deja sus productos a crédito y  cobra semanalmente, dice que le encanta vender  y que tiene muchos clientes que la prefieren a pesar de la competencia por la forma como ella trata a sus clientes.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar más mercadería como ropa, bisutería, perfumes y cosméticos. Sus sueños son tener un gran local donde vender sus productos.
texts.en:
In Portoviejo city, capital of Manabí known for years as the city of the tamarinds, the Communal Bank “Damas Positivas” (Positive Ladies) meets every fifteen days.

Leonor has completed 4 cycles with the Communal Bank and she likes the additional benefits that the institution provides and the ease of making payments. She is 41 years old, married, and has two children ages 13 and 9 who attend school. Her husband works in a bank.

She sells Avon products (beauty items, cosmetics, perfume, and accessories for women) and clothing by catalogue. She works Monday to Friday, four hours per day; she takes orders and delivers her products on credit, collecting payments weekly from her customers. She says that she loves selling and has many customers that prefer her in spite of the competition from other products because of the way she treats her customers.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise such as clothing, costume jewelry, and cosmetics. Her dreams are to have a great locale from which to sell her products.

loans.use: Buy clothing, costume jewelry, and cosmetics

loans.name: Jaqueline De La Paz

texts.es:
Doña Jaqueline, tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su hermana y su hijo de 19 años de edad, tienen cas propia, su negocio es un chalet y cafetín,  este negocio quien lo inicio fue su madre desde hace 10 años y lo atiende de 6:00am a 4:00pm, lo tienen ubicado en la unidad de salud de Jucuapa.
Ella necesita hacerle una inversión al negocio en mercadería como gaseosa, pan dulce, chicharrón, quesillo, pan, agua, jugos, con esta inversión estará creciendo con el negocio y ofrecerá mejores y más productos a los clientes.
Jaqueline tiene como objetivo mantenerse competente con el chalet, ganar más clientela, aumentar su potencial económico para ayudar a su hijo a superarse al igual que a su hermana.
texts.en:
Jaqueline is 46 years old.  She lives with her sister and her 19 year-old son in their own home.  Her business is a small café.  Her mother started the business 10 years ago and Jaqueline works there from 6.00am to 4.00pm.

The business is located in Jucuapa Health Center.  Jaqueline needs to invest in buying merchandise for her business such as soda, sweet bread, pork rinds, 'quesillo' (a soft cheese popular in Central America), bread, water and juice.  This investment will help her make progress in her business and enable her to offer more and better products to her customers.  Jaqueline's aims are to keep up to date in her business, to attract more customers and to increase her financial potential so that she can help her son and sister to better themselves.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as soda, sweet bread, pork rinds, 'quesillo' (soft cheese), bread, water and juice

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es: La señora Karla tiene 34 años, tiene un hijo a su cargo.
